167a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshun pa ches ni dang ldan na ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyad pa rnams yin te/ba'i gang zhe na/shes pas
167a2(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed pa dang /chos thams cad rkyen las rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang /stong
167a3(mdo sde): pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang /chags pa thams cad las yang drug par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su
167a4(mdo sde): shes po srung ba ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/shes pas las byed de drag dra rgyal yong min zhing //brten lo mkhas pa yin zhing de
167a5(mdo sde): dag lta med pa//stong nyid sbyong yulA de dag sems can mi gtong zhing //chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nang gnas pa med//chos mchog bzhi po de la shin tu
167a6(mdo sde): rab gnas pa//shes pas pha rlob phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che sra bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi mun pa
167a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin te/bzhi gango zhe na/thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang /zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang /chos
167b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /tshul gcig la 'jug pas thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa
167b2(mdo sde): ste/chos bzhi po de dag drang ngo //de lo 'di skad ces bya ste/de dag thos tshal ngoms med tshul bzhin rtogs byed cing //de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshol mo byed//
167b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs sbyin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur blta//chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug/tshwa bdag chos bzhi de brten khyad par thob 'gyur zhing //shes rab sgron
167b4(mdo sde): dadras mun bsngal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi drung ldan na 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams
167b5(mdo sde): yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang /sems can thams
167b6(mdo sde): da la bdag med pa sten pa'i snying rje chen po dang /bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi gro cha bgos pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //
167b7(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/thos kun chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing //de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed//snying rjes chos 'de thams
168a1(mdo sde): cad bdag med ston byed cing //mngon shes shes pa'i glo bgos bdud kyis mi nyams la//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag gis 'jug
168a2(mdo sde): na//'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thos pas don la rton pa rnams yon
168a3(mdo sde): te/bzhi pa dri zhe na/thos pas thams cad mi 'dzin pas thos pa dang mi ldan zhing sgrubs pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /yi ge dang /sgra dang /
168a4(mdo sde): skad dang /tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir/brag ca dang mtshungs po nyid du khong du chud pa dang /don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa
168a5(mdo sde): yongs su rgol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i byir pa yin pa dang /brjod du med pa'i don la 'jug cing brjod pa'i don ma yin pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de
168a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ji tsam mong du thos kyang de la mi rtog pas//byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams srid gsum sgra skud dbyangs dang tshig lam
168a7(mdo sde): gang yod pa//brag ca 'dra bar de las don ldan sgra thos nas//don nyid rtogs cing dga' mabur nyes kun phyir mi 'jug/chos nyid 'de ni don mchog yin te brjed
168b1(mdo sde): du med//'di ni don dang sgra skad bos par gyur pa las//'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
168b2(mdo sde): ldan na 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la ston pa rnam pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la ches ston pa dang /skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag lnga 'chi ba
168b3(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /'du 'dzi thams cad la dben paro gzhol ba ste/chos bzhi po de dag /
168b4(mdo sde): dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang che skye bo mang po'i dbus su son byur pa//dwer ni mkhas pas ches kyi gtam la 'jug par bya//skye ba mang po 'dus par gyur
168b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs rnams pa//'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom par bya//des ni bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi//gtong po yi rangs byas nas byung
168b6(mdo sde): chub bsngo bya zhing //gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i rje//de ro ni dben par gzhol bar rab tu 'dod par bya//lde'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems depar
168b7(mdo sde): chen po che so bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /
169a1(mdo sde): pa sgru snying por byed pa dang /dzing+ga smras pa de bzhin du byed bya dang /rang bzhin hrIs dug med pa la jug pa ste chos pani khyo dag
169a2(mdo sde): drang ngo //de la di skad ces bya ste/nyamang gnod par gyur kya byang chub sems mi ga tong //de dag skyob pa'i chos zas sgrub pa sprid par byed//b+haka blo bde man
169a3(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//mangs pa de dag chos kun rang bzhon byedag med 'jug/de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing //rtag rkyen
169a4(mdo sde): rjes pa gi med ci rang med//rgyug sman pa'i phreng ba phyogs 'dur khrigs 'byur zhing //de ltar chos ste de dag chos zhes sa gas
169a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems da' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag nyid bsgrub pa gnas shing
169a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /bdag nyid dul ba dang /bsrung ba dang /grol ba dang /bdul ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems
169a7(mdo sde): can gzhan dag dul bar bya'i dang /bslang ba dang /dgol ba dang /gdul ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang /
169b1(mdo sde): nyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa ngas par byur cing sems rgyan rnams kyang zlog pa chen po lnga rab tu 'god par byed pa dang /bdag nyid chos 'dod cing
169b2(mdo sde): 'dod pas gzhan dga' 'di ston par byed pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sgrib pa snying po byed dI ng+ge 'acwol rgyas ston la//dril
169b3(mdo sde): legs partul shin tu mya ngan 'das gnos kyang //gang dag me dul me bsdungs me brtul mya ngan las//mi 'das de dag chos kyang //na mchog 'byor pa drud/
169b4(mdo sde): de dag byang chub sems la bsam pa nges gyur cing //thegle ba de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed//rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bra ma gus byed cing //
169b5(mdo sde): cananamos la de dang mthun pa'i cho sa rnams ston//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'i chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par ngon sa pa rnams kyis 'don
169b6(mdo sde): pa phyags pa rnams yin te/bzhi gang she maM/yang dang yong du tshangs pa'i gnas bya bzhi'i gnas pa dang /ga pa na tu rab tu dben par gnas pa da /
169b7(mdo sde): zab mo la bzod pa dang /lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces byaste/tshangs pa'i gnas pa
170a1(mdo sde): rtag cu gnas sh+le//danan par gnas pa lta yang drug bskyed byed la//shes byas shA ma'i spyod las nges pa dUr byung //pash+tsa dang /
170a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par myur ba ste/de ltar mngon par brtson pa 'jig ts+tsha pa rnams//mngon shes snga bo dag gis mngon par 'dugs
170a3(mdo sde): de dag sbyangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dul//sems can glang po rnams nga yongs su smin byed gyur//k+Sha'i'u byang chub sem snad par sems de'i chen
170a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ljon ne bdud bams nyid kyis ba pa d+makar ba rnams yin te/bzhi phyung zhe na/snyid po nyid rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsem gtan bzhi dang /
170a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi sa dung rgyun mi gad pa'i brtson 'argyas dang /thab sa la ma khasmra ba mngon par sgyu
170a6(mdo sde): ba'i pha rol tu byin pa byug rgyas bzhi bde byung ngo //de la 'di skad ce s+ya b+h+yAM m+b+ha/na med stong pas 'am ba'i bosam gtan bani bsgom ning //sems tshon
170a7(mdo sde): nga rdzus ni chogs sa rkyen rgya nga //kun rtsub khyen pa rgyu jug/de ltar
170b1(mdo sde): spyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa//de dag bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyur cing //bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'phro ba mgon med rnams//mya ngan
170b2(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe
170b3(mdo sde): nA/chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang /rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang /rtag tu yid byung zhing chos soms par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
170b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang //rtag
170b5(mdo sde): tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' gyur la//rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam bzhugs gyur cing //sems kyis nges byar rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i//mkhas//
170b6(mdo sde): dwa theg pa che la brten bra rabA gnas pa//blo rnams dag gis ga ting dpag dka' bar rab 'byung zhing //chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag bsgrub byed pa//de
170b7(mdo sde): phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na//'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi
171a1(mdo sde): gos pa rnams yin te//brlad gang zhe na/rnyed pa dang /snyan pa dang /bstod pa dang /blang bas khengs pa med pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang //
171a2(mdo sde): mi snyan pa dang /smad ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed
171a3(mdo sde): pa dang /phung po yongs su shrIs bai srung zhing dben par lta ba ste chos brgyad po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skrod ceso bya ste/rnyed dang stan dang bstong dang badri
171a4(mdo sde): ba kun thob kyang //de dag lnga ni nam yong khengs byar 'gyur ba med//ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang //de dag pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig
171a5(mdo sde): rten spyod//sems can smin par bya phyir phung po yongs spyod cing //phung po sgyu ma gso ga 'dra la ma brlare shes pa//sems can phan pa de'i do ni 'jig rten spyod
171a6(mdo sde): byed //'jig rten chos kyis mi gros chulab khrims spos dang ldan//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gting dpani
171a7(mdo sde): dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag la bdag med pa dang //sems can la sems can med pa dang /chos dben pa dang /
171b1(mdo sde): shes pa chags pa med pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing //sems can sems
171b2(mdo sde): can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la//chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su shos gyur cing //mtha' la lag bzhi ni shes rab chags pa yod min pa'i//dpa'
171b3(mdo sde): rnams zab mo dag lo yongs su spyod byed la//spyad pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing //'dzin drang kun 'dzin kun dang rnam par bral gyur pas//sems can
171b4(mdo sde): dag pa de dag dri phyir gting dngag dka'o//lha'i blo byang chub sems dpo' sems drapa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos ston pas dbang po rnams la mkhas pa rnams
171b5(mdo sde): yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang /shes rab rno ba dang /sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/
171b6(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste//mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing //shes pas so so yang dag rig pas mi zad gyur//rtag
171b7(mdo sde): tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni//yang dag bsags pa yongs su dge pa thob gyur pa//sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes pas nas//de dang
172a1(mdo sde): 'dra ba'o chos rnams yongs su ston par byed//de dag bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin te//de phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed /
172a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na bai chos phren dang ldan na 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar ngo'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ba zhi gang
172a3(mdo sde): zhe na/stong pa nyid snod yul du gyur cing /lnga ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar bar byed pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la gnas shring rnam par
172a4(mdo sde): rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan pas 'da' bar byed pa dang /ston pa med pa la gnas zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skyeng
172a5(mdo sde): len du dong thabs la mkhas shing shes ra kyangs par byung ba ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas btsang
172a6(mdo sde): grol byed cing //mtshan med gnas shing sems can+do 'di dag yongs smin byed//smon pa med la gnas shIng sems can smin pa'i phyir//bsam bzhin sku
172a7(mdo sde): zhing gong du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur//shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam par sgor gnas kyang /'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni dus mo ni thob mi byed//lnga'i bu bya
172b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos
172b2(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang /chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang /kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes
172b3(mdo sde): pA dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad la nem nur med pa ste chos bzhi pa de dag dang //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sems mnyam chos
172b4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing //de dag rnams kyis sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong mi 'gyur//nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung b.ro//shes nas de las sngal
172b5(mdo sde): zhi kun tu ston mi byed//chos 'dri thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang //ma skyes ma 'grag ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin//de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal
172b6(mdo sde): mya ngan pangs gyur zheso//lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag rAr gcing byed pa yin//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ljon na las kyi bya ba
172b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yon te/bzhi gang zhe na/longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mo spong ba dang /mtho ris su skye ba'i rgya tshul khrims mi spong ba dang /
173a1(mdo sde): shAsgyur ba tshan pa'i rgyubs pa mi sbyang ba dang bral ba sgom pa mi sbyong bsta chos bzhi pa dag dang ngo //de la'ang sbyang / spyang
173a2(mdo sde): che rgyu sbyin pa mi sbyong de'i 'bras de//man+to rIs s+t+waM d+hA tshul khrims the'i ting de'i 'bras de//shes rab nyon mongs 'joms d+he sa pa de'i byings pa/mtha
173a3(mdo sde): rgyusgom par byed cing de 'bros de//rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas bya de dge ni//bye chub snying po dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mkhyen nga /
173a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na lta ba'i rnam pa dang bra shing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas po rnams yin te/bzhi gang ni ni/
173a5(mdo sde): par smra ba ma yin pa dang /rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang /mu rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lci zhing bdag tu lta bar mi byed pa dang /ma rig pa 'ag shes
173a6(mdo sde): narbA shi'i bur du bkag shA lta zhing srid pa 'gog par yang mi byed pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/nem yang rtug par mi lci tshang
173a7(mdo sde): par lhung mi byed//des ni chos rnams rkyen byang byed pa po dang no//tshor rab po mang rang bzhin rnam par dag par zhes/mo rig rtsa las rga shi'i bar du 'byung
173b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba//rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang nI//rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad skye mi 'gyur zhes gsungs//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
173b2(mdo sde): po ches bzhi dang ldan na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thab so la mkhas pa rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rag las ba
173b3(mdo sde): lta ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo ba med pa dang /'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang /sems can rnams kyi
173b4(mdo sde): mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i myos pa thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
173b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la brten//dge ba sogs shing 'dod pas yongs su skye ba med//'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshulo zhing
173b6(mdo sde): sems cano ji bzhini mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shisa?//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na se mos can thams cad kyi nye bar
173b7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/longs spyod mi zad pa dang /chos ston pa mi zad pa dang /mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /sems pa ltar mnyam pa ste chos
174a1(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/de dag rnams kyi ljongs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing //rtag tu chos kyi mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin//
174a2(mdo sde): de dag mngon shes lnga po mi zad rtag mi g.yo//rtag tu dran ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin//mnyam meng byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing //mya ngan
174a3(mdo sde): ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa//de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsho 'gyur zhing //byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur//lha'i bu byung
174a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yon te/bzhi gang zhe na/tshang sa de'i gnas
174a5(mdo sde): pa bzhi gnas pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang /bden pa bzhi shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa skye/chos bzhi po de dag
174a6(mdo sde): dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing //bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed la//bden pa bzhi pa
174a7(mdo sde): dag la 'jig med dnga'abo rnamaso//'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur//so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing //'chad dang klog pa
174b1(mdo sde): dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la//'a rol bde bar gyur pa'i badre bas mgu byed na//de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems
174b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul
174b3(mdo sde): 'chos pa med pa dang /des she 'grogs na bde ba dang /dben pa la dga' shing dbang po bsrung ba dang /bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags pa med cing rtag
174b4(mdo sde): tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol ston//tshul 'chos med cing
174b5(mdo sde): rtag tu nges la brtul shubras bzang //nags dang nags rab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la//dran ldan bdag 'di mi ltos kha na mtho ste//gang la rtag tu dge ba'i
174b6(mdo sde): yon tan de yod pa//de dag rtag tu sems can pan phyir brtson 'grus zhing //di drag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la//de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir ni
174b7(mdo sde): yid gzhol 'gyur//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa'i chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i sbyor ba thams cad la sdud pa med pa rnams yin te/bzhi
175a1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang /snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa drang /theg pa chen por
175a2(mdo sde): yongs su bsngob la mkhas pa rnams yin te bzhi pa de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/de dag dang dang ldan la rdul de brtan ldan zhing //de dag brtson sa
175a3(mdo sde): mthu dang sto sa dang ldan pa yin//'gro ba kun la byam sa dang snying rje rgyu ldan zhing //byang chub ched du yongs su bsngol me ngas pa ste//de phyir dge kun la smos
175a4(mdo sde): bapyod min zhing //zla ba nya da'i zla ba ma pa 'o skar ma yi//tshogs kyi dbus na gnas po rnam par mdzes bdag/ying dang rang du dge ba kun la rnam 'di lnga 'gyur//
175a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed
175a6(mdo sde): ba dang /sgrung ba snying por byed pa dang /blo rab du gnas pa dang /lhag pa bsam rdo rje ltar brtan pa sde chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
175a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa de dag ji skad smos pa de bzhin byed//de dag bsgrub pa snying por byed cing blo rab gnas//gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi//lhag pa'i bsom
175b1(mdo sde): brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur//mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag ston byed pa//de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed cing //rnam bcas rnams la
175b2(mdo sde): snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang //rtag tu sangs rgyas gsungs yang 'dzin par byed pa yin//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na
175b3(mdo sde): chos la rdobang bsgyur bas dbang phyug du gyur pa rnams yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa
175b4(mdo sde): dang /sems yi dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sbyar ba ma yin pa dang /gzung dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang /'bras bu yod par chos
175b5(mdo sde): ston pa rnams yin te chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro/shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs
175b6(mdo sde): lha rnams kun tu bral//sems la dbang sgyur byed snying bdud bzhi spangos gyur la//spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrug pa med//de dag ston pa 'bras/
175b7(mdo sde): bu med par mi 'gyur te//de phyir myur bu dpe'i phyog nyid dang ldan par 'gyur//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams ched
176a1(mdo sde): la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/bzhi pa zhe na/nga rgyal med pa dang /bla ma la gus pa dang /bag yod pa dang /bdun pa drag po ste
176a2(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de ldi 'di skad ces bya ste/nga rgyal med cing bla mor bus pas gnas gyur la//kun nas ngal yod byang chub mchog la 'dun dag
176a3(mdo sde): cing //bsam pa zag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gror lo//slob dpon dpe khyud med pa rtag tu slob dben 'gyur//mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas
176a4(mdo sde): shing /tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i mkhas pas brtan pa rnams//'jig rteni kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud //de phyir 'gro ba spyi bor thal sbyar de la
176a5(mdo sde): 'dud//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thams cad du kha na mtho ba med cing yon tan rnam po thams cad dang ldan pa rnams
176a6(mdo sde): yin te/ba'i grang zhe na/mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par brtsi ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dadongos po'i spobs pa dang /dge ba thams cad
176a7(mdo sde): dang mi 'dral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang /dpe ba'i tshe sa thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //de la 'di
176b1(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas brtse//bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan//brtson 'grus thog ma/
176b2(mdo sde): mi dge bgo chags kun spangs shing //dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste//chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa//de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i
176b3(mdo sde): yon tan ldan//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa ne lha drang mi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyes 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o
176b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do//byang chub sems dpo nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags
176b5(mdo sde): 'bum ni chos rnams los chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dog go//stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i de rnam pa drug tu
176b6(mdo sde): tu g.yos shing 'jig rten thamaswa cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab cing /lha'i bsil snyan dag gi sgra'
176b7(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to//klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang klu'i me tog gi tshar rab tu phab bo//lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye
177a1(mdo sde): chen po dang /gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
177a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang /a lU la chos/a la la chos/yal la chos zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so//de nas
177a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don
177a4(mdo sde): dang tshig rnam par glutan lnga 'bebs pa bstan par bka' stsal gyis/'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dang
177a5(mdo sde): bu de la spongs par gyis shig 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dngo' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi drong mi 'jog pa rnams yin/'jam dpal
177a6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpo' sems pa 'a chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
177a7(mdo sde): chen rig pa chen po la gzhon gyi drong mi 'jog pa rnams yin no//lha'i dus smras pa/'dzem rangal ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
177b1(mdo sde): ba thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams
177b2(mdo sde): cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de lta ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam po thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus
177b3(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dbul ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras
177b4(mdo sde): /lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen
177b5(mdo sde): ngo bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'bags pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras po/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi
177b6(mdo sde): chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis skyes pa/lho'i bu gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags
177b7(mdo sde): par mi byed pa de lta ni lce'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal
178a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi cha
178a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cadadA ra rnga bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi
178a4(mdo sde): nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams ya ni/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub semasr-i dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par
178a5(mdo sde): bye na mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//lnga'i bus smos pa/
178a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
178a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pos don la rton
178b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/'jam
178b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dranga' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems
178b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul phyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
178b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
178b5(mdo sde): rnams sgo thams cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba
178b6(mdo sde): rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/'jam dpal
178b7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' semaso dnga'i chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dngul ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179a2(mdo sde): po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
179a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na lce'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams
179a4(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jom dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams yin/'jam dpal
179a5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/g+hong bu gang gA tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs
179a6(mdo sde): su tshal bar byed pa de lta na lha'i dro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis nu par dka' bo rnams yin no//lha'i blos smras pa/'jam dpal
179a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' bo rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa'
179b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kIs gting rtogs par byed pa de ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos blos gting dang gra dka'
179b2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no//lha'i bus smos pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub se mos dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/'jam
179b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de ldan
179b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'i chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
179b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zang mo la spyod pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis skyes pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa'
179b6(mdo sde): chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas skyed lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dopag dka' zhing zab mo la smod pa rnams
179b7(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mangs pa rnams yin/'dzam dpal
180a1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pang de
180a2(mdo sde): na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no//lho'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji dran pang
180a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gong gi
180a4(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen+do po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus
180a5(mdo sde): ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam byar dzar bya'i sgor branas pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smos pa/'jam drang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tsha
180a6(mdo sde): po lhog pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir stsol zhir brtsub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
180a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing lto bar byed pa de lta na
180b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'ja
180b2(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyal mkhas pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu grang gi tshe
180b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa lha na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams
180b4(mdo sde): cod kyi rgyal mkhas pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus skyes pa/'jam dpal ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel
180b5(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med
180b6(mdo sde): par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
180b7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/'jam
181a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed nga de lta na d+hA'i ru byang
181a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
181a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byasam pa yongs su dge pas bArol zhugs grub pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis skyes pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
181a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgom pa yongs
181a5(mdo sde): su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpa lo ji lta ru na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'bras pa'i sems med
181a6(mdo sde): cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/'jam dpa' gyis smras pa/lnga'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad
181a7(mdo sde): gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/lte bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'bras pa'i sems
181b1(mdo sde): med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams
181b2(mdo sde): cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yi ni/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub semos drapa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las
181b3(mdo sde): mthong bar byed pa de lta ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam
181b4(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
181b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
181b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon
181b7(mdo sde): par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs
182a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du dar 'byung ba rnams
182a2(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam drapal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams
182a3(mdo sde): yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed/spong bar mi byed pa de
182a4(mdo sde): ltar lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bstabs par 'gyur du rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'dzin drupal
182a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
182a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nom mkha' drang mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
182a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182b1(mdo sde): chen po shes rab drug la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings
182b2(mdo sde): kun tu 'byed par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag lo snying por gyur pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'dzom
182b3(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jami dpal ji ltar na
182b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
182b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing /tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byung
182b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thamab cad la slob dpon du gyur po rnams yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji lta ro nA byang chub sems dpa'i
182b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kho na mthong med cing yin tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
182b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po chos la dbang phyug tu grus pa
183a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang bsgrub par mi byed/chos 'ga' yang sel
183a2(mdo sde): bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no///
183a3(mdo sde): 'jam do bral gzhon nur gyur pas bsten pa 'dri bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
183a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams l-i chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//srog chags 'bum lhag tsam gyis bla na med
183a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog
183a6(mdo sde): gi char dag mngon par rab tu phob bo//thams cadado dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dbul gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang /dga'
183a7(mdo sde): pa dang /yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cig gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i
183b1(mdo sde): spobs pa mi chod pa'ang thob par gyur cig ces smos so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab/
183b2(mdo sde): pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no////bam po gnyis pa//dri nas lha'i bu rab rtul sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhan mar
183b3(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dang la ci khyod kho bo las chos kyis dgab pa 'dod dam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod
183b4(mdo sde): dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang 'drod pa spangs pa yin te/chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med
183b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni mig gi leme las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ltar mi snang ba yin no//chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir
183b6(mdo sde): ma byas pa yin no//chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no//chos 'di ni sems dang yid dang /rnam par shes bya dang bral ba'i phyir
183b7(mdo sde): bdog gi ba med pa yin no//chos 'di ni gtan yongs su mo grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa yin no//chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa
184a1(mdo sde): yin no//chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir dong ba med pa yin/
184a2(mdo sde): no//chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no//chos 'di na da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med po yin no//chos 'di
184a3(mdo sde): ni brtag cing spel ba dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba me pa yin no//cho su dridi ni nAm mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni gnyen po
184a4(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang /rlom
184a5(mdo sde): sems mod pa dang /ma brtag pa dang /rnam par ma brtag pa dang /rnam par ma bsgrub pa dang /kun tu ma bstan pa yin no//chos 'di ni skye ba dang 'jig
184a6(mdo sde): bA dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang /dor bu med pa yin no//chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas pa med por gnas pa
184a7(mdo sde): yin no//chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no//chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni
184b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no//chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no//chos 'di ni pas kyi rgol
184b2(mdo sde): bA thams cad dris par bcomo pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rdul drang bralo ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no//chos 'di
184b3(mdo sde): ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni dris par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin ni//cho so 'di ni rnam par shes pa ni granas pa'i phyir sngon
184b4(mdo sde): pa med pa yin no//chos bya ni rtse ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no//chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no//chos 'dri ni mi rten po'i phyir
184b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba yin no//chos 'dri ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no//chosra 'di no gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can
184b6(mdo sde): med pa yin no//chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byang ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no//chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no//chos
184b7(mdo sde): 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no//chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no//chos 'di ni
185a1(mdo sde): gzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no//chos 'di ni gzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chud pa med pa yin
185a2(mdo sde): sa 'dun mi rnyed pa da ma snarnam sa mnan// yi ga rdzunag
185a3(mdo sde): smras pa/'dzum dang laM chos 'di'i dgrib pa ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lce'i bu legs so legs sra//ji skad smras pa de bzhin
185a4(mdo sde): te/chos 'dri'i dgab pa ni gang la lus dang ngag dang /sems kyis rtul bla med pa de lta bu yin no//de dri'i phyir zhe na/chos 'di ni gsal brnyog pa med pa
185a5(mdo sde): yin pas de ni sdems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/'jam dpal gyis
185a6(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//sgra dang /skad dang /
185a7(mdo sde): dbyangs dang /tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes
185b1(mdo sde): su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//nyon mongs pa gtan spyod ba rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//skye ba la rten
185b2(mdo sde): pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni soms rnyog pa can yin no//ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems
185b3(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//sems can la brten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyortog
185b4(mdo sde): ba can yin no//bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//sems la nges par ma bsam pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni
185b5(mdo sde): sems rnyog pa can yin no//the tshom gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin//
185b6(mdo sde): no//gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog btsun yin no//chos
185b7(mdo sde): 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog
186a1(mdo sde): dz+nyAn yin no//bas dang sums la rten pa'i sbrul gyi rlung pa'i sems ni sam+b+has rnyog pardzun ston no//dbang po dag la na pa'i de nga tho
186a2(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//lta ba'i snonas dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//chos su 'dur shes pa la gnas pa'i byang
186a3(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam sgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
186a4(mdo sde): bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa con yin no//kun 'byung ba la sgom pa'i 'dra shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa nA yin no//
186a5(mdo sde): 'grig pa zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//lamya la sgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/lha'i bu ji tsam du
186a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sdong dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa cen yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sems rlom pa med pa dang dag
186a7(mdo sde): yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gdong ga sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal nam mkha' la sems cung
186b1(mdo sde): zad kyang yod dam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la sems med pa bzhin du sems de'ang de dang 'dra ste/gang gi sems de 'dra ba de ni
186b2(mdo sde): sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpa lo gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu lhag par
186b3(mdo sde): byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin+da no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/'jam dpal byos slas
186b4(mdo sde): po/lha'i bu gang sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpol ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/'jam dpal
186b5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/lha'i du rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no//mi rtog par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no//de bzhin du bde ba dang /sdug bsngalnga dang /
186b6(mdo sde): sdug pi drang /mi sdug pa dang /bdag dang /bodag med par byed pa ni lhag por byed pa yin no//stong pa zhes bya ba dang /gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par
186b7(mdo sde): byed pa yin no//mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang /smon pa mengo pa zhes bya de ni lhog par byed pa yin no//sgyu ma dang /rmi lam dang /mig yor dang /
187a1(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan dang /drag ca dang /nu zla dang /smig rgyu dang /sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gi chos rnam par 'jog par byed/mtshon par//
187a2(mdo sde): byed/'jug par byed/ston par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no//de ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/kun nas
187a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang /rnam par byang ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no//'khor ba la skyon du lta bar pyod pa dang /mya ngan las 'das
187a4(mdo sde): pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lha par byed pa yin te/lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis lhag par byed pa dag yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/
187a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na ldog pa'i nga rgyal med po yi ni/bajam dpal phyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams
187a6(mdo sde): cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang 'grog pa 'grog par yang mi byed la/skye ba med pa bskyed par yang mi byed cing /sgo thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed
187a7(mdo sde): la/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang po'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral po dang
187b1(mdo sde): blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no//'dzum drang la gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'drir shad pa na lha ri dwe ti l+le nyis stong
187b2(mdo sde): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang
187b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags stong phral/rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
187b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la ches kyi mig rdul myed cing dri mo dang bral ba rnam par dag go//khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba lis bud
187b5(mdo sde): med nyis stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad
187b6(mdo sde): ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag byed cag kyang the tshom ci yod pa dge 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpapa
187b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsem gtan byed pa ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yan/'jam dpal
188a1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/tsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni dra ba med pa dang /mtha' med pa dang /gnas
188a2(mdo sde): med pa la bsam gtan bying pa dang /mi 'khrugs pa la byas ma gtan byed pa dang /yang dag pa la bas mA gautan byed pa yin no//'od srung chen pos smras pa/
188a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ci las bras mo ti de skad smra/'dzum dpal gyis smras pa/blotsun pa 'di sbyang chun ze rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/mtha' ni der 'dzin pa yin/gnas ni
188a4(mdo sde): khams gsum pa yin/'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin/mi nyam pa ni gaurjes yin te/de la des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha'
188a5(mdo sde): med par shes/khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/bris ma gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes pas
188a6(mdo sde): na/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas de la sa ngas ma nas dge slong rnam par thar ba brgyad la ngasam gtan bye rA pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang /mtha' med pa dang /gnas
188a7(mdo sde): med pa la bsapa gtan byed pa dang /mi lpags pa la bsami gtan byed pa dang /yang dag pal posami gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so//shA ri'i bus
188b1(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
188b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang chags pa thams cad kyis gosde par mi 'gyur zhing /nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum du byed kyang
188b3(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/de tsam gyis ni byang chub
188b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no//mod+gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba
188b5(mdo sde): yin/'jam dpal gyis skyes pa/btsun pa med+gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma thob/'dus mo byas kyang ma thob la slob pa dang mi slob
188b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpe'o rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/'dzem dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
188b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med par gonas pa yin/'jom dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes
189a1(mdo sde): par byed la/nga rol dang tshur rol dang bral bar byed cing /byang chub kyi sgrib pa'ang mi spyong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing byung thams cad ston
189a2(mdo sde): par byed na/de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnaso pa yin no//byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
189a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos slu ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa dang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dab dra po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing 'du byed
189a4(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang /tshig dang /yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas por ston
189a5(mdo sde): par byed kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos ston pa yin no//nam grus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar nu byang chub sems
189a6(mdo sde): dpa'o bsdam gtan pa yin/'jam dngul gyis smras pa/btsun pa nam gru gang gi chu byang chub sems dpa' tshe sna thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag
189a7(mdo sde): pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/phyi ma'i ma ba'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed cing
189b1(mdo sde): bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo b+har mi 'gyur na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin+da no//nye bar 'khor dris smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar/
189b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/'jam dpal byos skyes pa/btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dulta ba nyid
189b3(mdo sde): du'ong shes par byed cing ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par byed cing /de ltar nyon mongs rnams rtogs
189b4(mdo sde): par yang byed la byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no//maM 'gagaso bas smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byung
189b5(mdo sde): chub semos dpa'o zhwa'i mog dang ldan po yin/'jam dpa la gyis smras pa/btsun pa me 'bugs pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams
189b6(mdo sde): sdud kyang mthong bar byed la/gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i
189b7(mdo sde): mig dang ldan pa yin no//bku las smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrung ba yin/'jam ngadabal gyis smras pa/gang gi tshe
190a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul yang myed par lhun de tsam gyis na byang chub sems
190a2(mdo sde): dpa' dbang po bsrung ba yin no//sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub se mos dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/'jam dngangulo gyis smras pa/
190a3(mdo sde): byang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir mtsham med po dang mnyam par lta bar byed na de tsam gyis nu byang chub sems dpa' dbang po
190a4(mdo sde): rno ba yin no//kat+yA'i bu chen pos smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mu khasdu pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
190a5(mdo sde): btsun pa kat+yA'i bu chen po byang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag byar rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing /tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgyu
190a6(mdo sde): cher rnam par 'byed cing sngon la/ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang /rnam par byang ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang //
190a7(mdo sde): chos nyid gnaso pa las me ge yo la gnas thams cad la'ang mi rten pa de ltar ston par byed na de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam por 'byed pa
190b1(mdo sde): lam byas pa yin no//gsus po che chen pos smras pa/'jam dngul ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

190b3(mdo sde): byabaston pa dang /ming dang mtshan me med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dgra par rig pa ston pa dang /brag cu dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par/

191a2(mdo sde): par byed la ji ltar thos pa'ang 'dzin par byed cing /ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston por yang byed na de tsam gyis ni byang chub se mos dpa' mang du thos pa yin no//nga nas

191b1(mdo sde): thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bsnun pa yin te/legs stso legs so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de de bzhin te/nyan zas ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal/
