198a1(mdo sde): su 'brel zhing zhi ba dang nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang /'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs
198a2(mdo sde): su spyod par byed cing nyon mongasra pa'i sgron rnams kyis migo sla pa dang /slob pa drong mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed
198a3(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can rnams kyi bsam pA la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa drang /bdud kyi lceg so kyu shes par byed cing chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi
198a4(mdo sde): byed pa dang /shes pas 'jug par byed cing thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang /'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing 'phags po ma yin pa yongs su smon par bya ba
198a5(mdo sde): lo spro bar byed pa dang /sangs rgya so mthong ba la mngon par dga' bor byed ci de chos mthong ba la kun du 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa
198a6(mdo sde): myed pa yin no//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la cho so kyi mig rdul med ri dro dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag
198a7(mdo sde): /lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba
198b1(mdo sde): chos la bzod par ba thob par gyur to//byang chub sems N+DI dI ni spobs pa thags pa med pasmos so//lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags stor drag
198b2(mdo sde): rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub ngu sems bskyed nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dang lo gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dge byas so//gzhan yang lha'i
198b3(mdo sde): bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jom dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/'jam dpal gyis
198b4(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags spang po'i phyir yang chos sbyin par byed la 'drod chags dang bral ba mngon du 'dra mi byed pa dang /zhe sdang
198b5(mdo sde): spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed lA zhe sdang spong ba mngon du mi byed po dang /gti mug spongs pa'i phyir yung chos ston par byed lnga gti mugo spong ba mngon du'ang
198b6(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang /nyon mongasde pa spangs pa'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la nyon mongs po spang ba mngon du 'ong mi byed pa tsam gyis no lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lAm
198b7(mdo sde): la gonas pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub se mos dpa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston par yang byed la/stong pa nyid mngon du'ang mi
199a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la mtshan ma med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang /sems can rnams la
199a2(mdo sde): smon pa med pa ston por yang byed la smon pa med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang /de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'dri byed pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa
199a3(mdo sde): dang /'byung ba med pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /'dod tshogs drang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang /'gog pa'i chos ston por yang byed la 'gog pa mngon
199a4(mdo sde): du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang grang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin
199a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /chub khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /gnod sems kyis
199a6(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa slob par byed pa dang /le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /brjed nges bso bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
199a7(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa dang /be mos po dang /lug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la pornam pa
199b1(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci las bsam te de skad smra/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
199b2(mdo sde): yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang /byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong
199b3(mdo sde): ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par
199b4(mdo sde): byed do//lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni de'i rang bzhini ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas te/tshul khrims las yang dag par 'oda' bsngo ting nge
199b5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang /ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rib dang /shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/lha'i bu khyod
199b6(mdo sde): kyis rnam drangs nges gang tshul khrims lngas yang dag yar 'da' ba de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o//lha'i bu byang chub sems
199b7(mdo sde): dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pos de ni theg pa chen
200a1(mdo sde): po la legs par zhugs pa yin no//glang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no//lha
200a2(mdo sde): bu gung gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi rtul bar mi byed cing ngag drang sems kyi brtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/blang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson
200a3(mdo sde): pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na'ang sa gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed/
200a4(mdo sde): par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas po yin la/gong nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjod ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag pa yin pas de ni bsam///
200a5(mdo sde): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no//lha'i bu chos thams cod ni bems po ste/rtswa dang /shing dang /rtsig pa dang /lam dang /mig yor dang /
200a6(mdo sde): lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'dri bar rong bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad
200a7(mdo sde): bems po dang /lug ltar lkugs pa lta bur byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub
200b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang
200b2(mdo sde): tshol bar byed pa dang /lamo gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing la mr-i byi bya ba'ing sgrub par byed pa dang /lum ngan par zhugs pa'i snyoms can rnams kyang lam la
200b3(mdo sde): 'god par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhon yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang chos
200b4(mdo sde): thams cad btsal yang mau rnyed pa dang /byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang /'bras bu yod pa bsamo gtan byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi//
200b5(mdo sde): lam thob pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mo
200b6(mdo sde): byed pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par
200b7(mdo sde): byed la lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung dor mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gonas pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang
201a1(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang /
201a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bor byed pa dang /byang chub kyi phyir 'phel
201a3(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam le gnas pa yin no//lha'i bu gzhan yang
201a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed pa drung /lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na
201a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no//lha'i bus skas pa/'jamo dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed
201a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khror bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs
201a7(mdo sde): su tshol bar byed kyi/bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//lho'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad
201b1(mdo sde): dang mi mthun pa yin no//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'dri ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa
201b2(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba sngon par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba
201b3(mdo sde): med par shes shing skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang /phung po dang khams dang /skye mched la yongs su spyod pa byed kyang phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched
201b4(mdo sde): don du mi gnyer ba dang /phung po dang /khoms dang /skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston kyang yongs su shes pa de dag yongs
201b5(mdo sde): su shis par mi byed pa dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam por thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par bsgrub par byed cing sems/
201b6(mdo sde): rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /bdud kyi yul te bar ston par byed kyang bdud kyi las rnams kyis
201b7(mdo sde): mi 'bregs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang /bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa
202a1(mdo sde): dang /sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas nA de'i phyir sems can chen po de drug gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
202a2(mdo sde): pa yin no//lnga'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpo'i rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu bsam
202a3(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang /rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang /sems mi brjed
202a4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa la spyod pa dang /sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang /sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang /rgas
202a5(mdo sde): pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang /lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang /chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la
202a6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /sngos pa med po nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang /sems can ldang dag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang /nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin
202a7(mdo sde): rarab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang /rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod po dang /mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la
202b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa las sar rtog pa la spyod pa dang /yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir smyug bsngal rdza sa sar rtag pa la spyang
202b2(mdo sde): po dang /byin ci log rang bzhin mod pa sbyor bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa po spyod pa dang /'du shrIs yongs su shes de'i phyir zhi bo la so sor rtog pa la stong pa dang //
202b3(mdo sde): phung po sgyu mo lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la spyod pa dang /mo rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyong ba dang /rang
202b4(mdo sde): bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir 'dog pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang /'bras bu yongs su shes
202b5(mdo sde): pA nyid kyis rgyu shes pa lo spyod pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang /du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang /brjod du med pa'i
202b6(mdo sde): phyir don sngo so yang dang phyir rig pa la spyod pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dbyar med pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig bya la spyod pa dang /ming dang gzugs 'byung
202b7(mdo sde): ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang /brag ca dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spong ba dang /chag
203a1(mdo sde): 'thugs lngab nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la skyed pa dang /las/
203a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa stong pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gri madro sde la rton pa la spyod pa dang /gang zag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang /las rnam
203a3(mdo sde): par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims rnam par dgo ba'i phyir lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang /ting ngo 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa
203a4(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang /dus gsum monyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /sems la dbang snang ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa la
203a5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /mi byed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan po la spyod pa dang /me lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa srab la spyod pa dang /bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas med pa la spyod pa dang /
203a6(mdo sde): thaM dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mo nyam pa la spyod pa dong //thams cad rjes sum logs pa'i phyir sA dang /chu dang /mr-i dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' lta bur stu
203a7(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang /yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang /rnam par
203b1(mdo sde): 'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang /bu dag mi sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma mong pa/
203b2(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang /khams grasum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon po med pa la spyod pa dang /'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa
203b3(mdo sde): med pa la spyod pa dang /sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshur bcad pa la spyod pa dang /spyod pa thams cad rnam
203b4(mdo sde): bar bsgrub po'i mtshan nyid kyis dgon mchog gsum gyi gdung me gcod pa la spyod pa ste/lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
203b5(mdo sde): la spyod pa yin no///bam po gsum pa sde tha ma//lha'i bus smras po/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpo'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
203b6(mdo sde): laso yang dag rlur 'das pa yin no//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de de bzhin te/lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjes su 'breng ba ma yin pa
203b7(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang /gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /phyir mi
204a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang /gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang /rangs sa rgyas ma yin pa dang /gang sangs rgyas bcom
204a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang /ston pa de ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems
204a3(mdo sde): dpe' yin par mi smra'o//lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so skye bo'i cho su can ma yin pa dang /'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang /zhe sdang gi
204a4(mdo sde): ches can ma yin pa dang /gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang /gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang /yongs su mya ngan lngas 'dang ba'i chos can ma yin
204a5(mdo sde): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci las bsam ste de skad smra/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
204a6(mdo sde): dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rdzun du zhugs pa dang /lan tsog phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom
204a7(mdo sde): pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
204b1(mdo sde): ston pa dang /so so skye bo'i chos can dang /'dod chags kyi chos can dang /zhe sdang gro chos can dang /gti mug gi chos rgan dang /'khor ba chos can dang /yod
204b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang /
204b3(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /gzhan gyi dang pos mi 'gro ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa skyed cing 'dzin
204b4(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /chags pas tshogs par gyur pa rnams thar bar byed pa dang /chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang /'khor ba lo chags par
204b5(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang /mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji
204b6(mdo sde): lta na byang chub semos dpa' chos kyi rjes su dbrang ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa
204b7(mdo sde): 'dzin por byed pa dang /kun 'dzin par byed pa dang /chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang /chos la gnas kyi nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang /chos
205a1(mdo sde): kyi stobs can yin gyi rgyar gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang /chos smra ba yin gyi 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam smad ma yin pa dang /chos kyi dngang
205a2(mdo sde): phyug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pA dang /chos la rngon pa yin gyi grang zag la rton pa ma yin bya dang /chos smra ba yin gyi chos ma yin par mi smra ba
205a3(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi rjes su bathun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang /chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang /
205a4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /nor bdun dang ldan pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na
205a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/'jam dpal gyis
205a6(mdo sde): smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems da' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang /lam yan
205a7(mdo sde): lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang /sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam de rings par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang /ma khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i
205b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang /skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtogs pa brgyad la gnas pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsdam
205b2(mdo sde): gtan byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam po mi spong ba de lnga no lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jamo dpal ji ltar/
205b3(mdo sde): nA byang chub sems dpa'o rgyan du zhugs pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu grong gi cha byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su dad pa rnams rgyun las
205b4(mdo sde): zlog par byed pa dang /'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang /ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod por byed pa dang /sems can
205b5(mdo sde): rnams po de 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang /mtshams bcad pa dang /lha dang /mi la gzhol ba dang /bden pa ston
205b6(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /rlomo sems su mi ltung pa dang /the tshom dang bral ba dang /nges pa dang /sangs nas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang /so so skye bo'i lam las yang dag
205b7(mdo sde): par 'ongs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la gnas pa dang /'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogaso bar gyur pa dang /'jog
206a1(mdo sde): rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang /'dus byas la snang ba dang /'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang /phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang /dge 'dun
206a2(mdo sde): lnga yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na lha'i blo byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun du zhugs pa yin no//lho'i bus smras pa/'jam dpol ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan
206a3(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba yin/'jam dpal gyi sa smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can
206a4(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du 'ong ba dang /sems tson rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /'ong ba dang /'gro bar ston par byed pa dang /chos
206a5(mdo sde): nyid la bong ba dang 'gro ba mong par mthong ba dang /'ong yang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang /rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang /'ong ba mnyam pa
206a6(mdo sde): nyid mi spong ba dang /bdud rtsi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang /byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong
206a7(mdo sde): ba dang /byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra zhing mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems ngopo'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jom dpal ste/
206b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi 'ong ba yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang ga rgyu byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang /phyin ci log rnam snang /
206b2(mdo sde): sgrib pa rnams su'ang ma 'ong ba dang /'dun pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /'dzegs po dang /gte nugaM gis kyang 'ong ba dang /'gro bar mi dgyur
206b3(mdo sde): ba dang /byas pa nges par ma gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang /bong ba med pa dang /'ango ba med pa la mkhas pa dang /rga shi mid pa
206b4(mdo sde): la thob pa dang //mthar gnas pa dang /byas po nges pa dang /lung bstan pa thob pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /rnam pa med pa thob pa dang /shes pas gzhan
206b5(mdo sde): la rag ma las pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/
206b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'drid chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /sdang ba
206b7(mdo sde): med cing zhe sdang gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /chos
207a1(mdo sde): thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang /sems can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson//
207a2(mdo sde): 'grus brnams pa dang /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang pad+ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma
207a3(mdo sde): gos pa dang /shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang /thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang /nye bar ljon pa thams cad la bdag gi med cing yongs///
207a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa med pa drang/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan
207a5(mdo sde): pa dang /gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med par gnas par byed pa dang /sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /tshu rol dang pha rol la
207a6(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang /tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs po dang /gzhan gyis sems can gzhan thar bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra
207a7(mdo sde): bcom pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/'jam dpalo gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
207b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang /yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa
207b2(mdo sde): med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang /chu dang /rkyen dang /bdag med bya /semos can med pa dang /rung bzhin gyis g.yo ba med po sgrogs par byed pa dang /sangs
207b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa drong /nam mkha dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyas
207b4(mdo sde): nye bar 'gro bar rtsoms shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang /sgrogs pa'ang gzhan gyi dring ming jog pa dang /thos byas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang /sgrogs pa thams
207b5(mdo sde): cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi chud pa yongaso su shes pa dang /so so yang dag par dag pa mi zad pa thod pa dang don dang tshig dang yi ga'i bya mi zad pa dang /sems can
207b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dang /spyod pa dang /shes par ston par byed pa dang /so so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa dang /zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang /spros pa
207b7(mdo sde): med pa dang /sngon gyi smon la mo bya sbyong ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no//lha'i bus smos pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang
208a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpang chos thams cad rkyen la rag gas pa dang /sems can mod
208a2(mdo sde): pa dang /srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /des rkyen rnams legs
208a3(mdo sde): par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang /bsdu ba'i
208a4(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang /tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang /mngon por shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par slob par byed pa dang //de rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed cing gzhan
208a5(mdo sde): gyi dring mi 'dzag pos byang chub mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang /sa ngan pa dag las sems skye bar byed pa dang /nye tshe bo'i shes pa'i dul ba la mkhas pa/
208a6(mdo sde): dang /theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no//lha'i
208a7(mdo sde): bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lho'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
208b1(mdo sde): gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtog par byed pa dang /ming mngon par rtogs par bya bar
208b2(mdo sde): phyir spyod pa dman pa dang /mchog dang /byang ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang /rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams kyang rtags par byed pa
208b3(mdo sde): dang /skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim phyis sa dang skyed pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang /sems can gyi dbang po dang /mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang /
208b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yon no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de
208b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshesras pa yin/'jom pal phyis sngas po/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lAm du 'gro ba dang /de bzhin nyi du mi brjed pa
208b6(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin nyid la rlab d+he gnas pa dang /de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang /de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang /de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang /de bzhin nyid kyi brtson
208b7(mdo sde): 'grus dang /de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang /de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang /de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang /de zhin nyid kyi smon lam dang /de bzhin nyid kyi
209a1(mdo sde): stobs dang /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang /de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med bya dang /sems can yongs su bar dang bye da dang /
209a2(mdo sde): sems can gyi gnas dang /'khor ba na'ang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang /spyod pa las stsol bar byed pa dang /de na 'ong yin la de na rang
209a3(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /'di na rang yin la 'dzin 'ang mo yin pa dang /gnyis ka las dag pa dang /mun pA dang dral po dang /rtag tu gsolnga pa dang /mun pa med pa dang /
209a4(mdo sde): mun pa'i ling rdog dang bral ba dang /de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang /de bzhin gshegs bya'i so'i rjes su song ba de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dang ba de bzhin
209a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/'jam dpale gyos skyes pa/lha'i bu gang
209a6(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs po bcom pa dang chu bo las rgal ba dong /srid da mdong ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi khur dang /srid pa 'jom pa dang /
209a7(mdo sde): sring po'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /bdud bcom pa dang /khur bor ba dang /srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba shes pa dang /bya ba shes pa dang /srid
209b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags bsal ba dang /lus dang sems sgom pa dang /tshul khrims dang /shes rab bsgoms pa dang /srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang /srid
209b2(mdo sde): pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang /sems can la bsam pa ma btang ba dang /sred pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang /chu lon dang zam po legs par byas pa dang /ma gnas
209b3(mdo sde): pas legs par gnas pa dang rtag tu sgoms pa la yid kyis brtson pa dang sems can gyi srid pa sra bar byed pa dang /srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang /
209b4(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar rlog par byed pa drang /srid pas rnam par brtse ba lnga mkhas po dang /srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mched
209b5(mdo sde): pa de lngar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o//lha'i bus smos pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
209b6(mdo sde): rgyas yin/'jimo dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub se bsde dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam po byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon
209b7(mdo sde): bor rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /lta ba'i rnam pa rloms dang phyin ci log rnams dang /sgrib pa rnams dang /tshong pa rnams dang /kun nas ldang ba rnams gang
210a1(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gaN+DI
210a2(mdo sde): myug dang mnyam pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pos mnyam po nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /
210a3(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /slob pa'i chos rnams dang /nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos
210a4(mdo sde): rnams pong dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang ma nyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /mnyam pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed
210a5(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lte bar byed pa dang /chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang /yod
210a6(mdo sde): pab ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na lho'i bu byang chub sems dpal yang
210a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngon pa yin/'jam dpor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu
210b1(mdo sde): gang gri tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang /rab tu ston pa dang /rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yo ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /bstan pa yongs
210b2(mdo sde): su 'dzin por 'gyur ba dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa drong /rab tu ston pa dang /ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams
210b3(mdo sde): cad kyi skyabs dang /gling dang /dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang /rab tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /the tshom dang bral ba dang /
210b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang /yang dag par smra ba dang /khams
210b5(mdo sde): gsum pas phyag byas pa dang /sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa med pa dang /yang dag po'i mtho legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang /brdeg pa dang /
210b6(mdo sde): dgod pa dang /bai shung ba dang /khro ba dang /spyo ba dang /bsdigs pa thams cad dang /rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /sems can gyi rang
210b7(mdo sde): bzhin legs par mthing ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang /'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
211a1(mdo sde): ston pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'as skyo sgru 'i tshus can yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha
211a2(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis sa skye bo'i spyod pa thams cadakyang ston par byed la shes pas so pa skye bo'i skyed pa thams cad la chags pa na'ang mi 'gyur ba de lta/
211a3(mdo sde): na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo'i chos can yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jom dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/'jam
211a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub ses dpa' rtag du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chagaso bar 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags
211a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /bsam pa tAn dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms por 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /sems
211a6(mdo sde): can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bo zhes bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu
211a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yini/'jam dpal
211b1(mdo sde): gyis smos pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thod pa la
211b2(mdo sde): sdang bar byed pa dang /nyon mongaso pa thams cad dang /'du byed thams cad la skyon du'ang 'du shes la nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'du byed rnams spong bar yang mi byed pa dang /
211b3(mdo sde): sems con yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyan gcod par mi byed pa dang /snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyed
211b4(mdo sde): por byed pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i bdam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang /sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod
211b5(mdo sde): pa nye dor sgrub par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang /'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang /'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de lta na lce'i bu byang chub sems
211b6(mdo sde): dpa' zhe sdang gi tshos can yin no//lha'i dus smras pa/'jamo dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grati mug gi chos can yon/'jam dngul gyis smras pa/lha'i bu
211b7(mdo sde): gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa de shes par mi byed rnam par
212a1(mdo sde): shes par mi byed/kun tu shes par mi byed/len par mi byed/stong bar mi byed/'azung bar mi rnyed/'jig par mi byed/gru yang mi byed/
212a2(mdo sde): rlom sems su mi byed/bskyong bar mi byeng /chas kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gag po la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpo gti mug gi choso can
212a3(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam do la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'di chos can yin/bajam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
212a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor ba las kyang migayo la de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang /bdud thams cad dang thun mongs yin zhing spyod pa de man pa rnams
212a5(mdo sde): dang ma 'dres pa dang /sems can rnams spyad pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang /ngan mthun par byed pa dang /mi dge ba thams cad
212a6(mdo sde): lnga mi bsngags brjod par byed cing mthun pa bzlog pa dang /phyir zlog par byed pa dang /byang chub 'khor po la gzhol bar shes par byeng ba dang /'khor ba mnyam pa nyid
212a7(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bu lta bar byed pa dang /'khor ba yis mi go yi zhong gnas pa'ang mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/
212b1(mdo sde): ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lhung du gang gro
212b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par blta bar byed pa dang /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes
212b3(mdo sde): por byed pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bo dang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang //sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum
212b4(mdo sde): gyiso 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang /yongs su mya ngan ltos 'das pa la'ang skyod par byed la/gtan du
212b5(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bo'i chos can yin te/
212b6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa dang /thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang /sems can thams ca la phan pa dang rjes su snying brtse bo dang ldan pa yin no//'jam dpal gno
212b7(mdo sde): nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bu mo lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//srog chags drug khri ni len
213a1(mdo sde): /pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//snron da ts+tsha ba bskyed cing spangs rnam mang grol basbyin bkur byas bya'i sems can rnams
213a2(mdo sde): kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems pa' nyi khyi lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to//
213a3(mdo sde): srog chagaso sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang
213a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchode par bya ba'i phyi me tog gi cher dag mngon par rab tu thobabo//de nas lha bur pa rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
213a5(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//'dzem dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dngang thabs dang shes rab kyi nges par 'byung ba yin/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lce'i bu rang rtsal
213a6(mdo sde): sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/gango tshe sems ni chags med pa//bla med byang chub sems yin te//sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum ge/de ni shes rab
213a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do//sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni//byang chub ngu ni yongs bsngo zhing //byang chub sems las rab rtas pa//de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do//sems
213b1(mdo sde): can thams cad bdag med cing //mi bden ya ma badrag sog tu//gang tshe shes pas shes byed pa//de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do//gang phyir sems can pasas
213b2(mdo sde): drug/byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing //bsam pa theg pas srung byed pa//de ni thabs kyi mtshon nyid do//gang che bdag dang byang chub dang //gtan du mthong bar mi da
213b3(mdo sde): ci //'khor gsum yongs su drug gyur pa//de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do//nang dang yang nA phyi ro yi dag/thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing //sems can kun
213b4(mdo sde): la yongs bsngo ba//de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do//zhi zhing ngag ni gtsang dag cing //tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la//lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa//dod shus
213b5(mdo sde): rab mtshan nyid do//tshul khyimamA la ni zhugs dUr cing //gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed yi//sangs rgyas tshu lo khrims bsngo byed pa//de phyir thabs shes bya ta yin//
213b6(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing //bdag med bzod pa sgoms byed pa//lus dngo sems kyis ma smras pa//de ni shes ri bo pha rol phyin//lus kyis sbyor bar mi
213b7(mdo sde): byed cing //ngag dang sems kyis ma yin la//chos rnams kun la dben gyur pa//de ni shes rab pa la byin//sems can kun gyi khro ba dang //gso dang 'ching ba
214a1(mdo sde): yod byed nga //son sU nang du myi drug/don la phyin//sems canu yongs su sbyin du gyur//bsam gtan bad par ltar
214a2(mdo sde): nas/grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa//de ni thams kyi pha rol phyin//tshu rol ma yin pa rol mon//mthun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing //spros pa'i lta ba rgyan bcad pa/
214a3(mdo sde): shes rab la byin rtogs yin//keng nis steng nyid rtogs gyur nas//de ni hang snyoms mi byed cing //sems can stod nyid sbyor byed pa//de ni bas kyi rgyu ma yin no//
214a4(mdo sde): nus gzugs med mkha' 'dra bar//chos kyis sgo nas blta byed cing //de tshe gzugs lnga zhen med pa//de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do//sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod
214a5(mdo sde): tsong //sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la//'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa//de phyir khrus shes bya ba yin//chos rnams rdul med rdulo bral zhing //mngar dra
214a6(mdo sde): mnyam pas mnyam sbyor la//chos 'ga' nga 'dzin par myi drug/do ni shes rab po la byin//chos ni yongs sug phye ba'i phyir//lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing //
214a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa//de ni thabs kyi sgo yin ni//chos byings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir//yang dag mtha' la rob gnas shing //de bzhin nyid las mi
214b1(mdo sde): g.yo ba//de ni shes rab sgo yin no//gang gi chos nyid ci 'dra ba//sems can de 'drar shes byed cing //de ltar rtog par byed de'i mtha'//de ni shes rab du tshul phyin//
214b2(mdo sde): chos kun 'chi 'pho yod min zhing //skye ba med parla shes byed la//mi 'gro chug par mi byed pa//de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir//mkhas
214b3(mdo sde): phyi 'dod dang gzugs rnams su//bsam bzhin du ni skyo byed pa//de dag thebs kyi yon tan yin//dgon pa gnas ro ba gnas byed cing //nyon mongs med la rab gnas
214b4(mdo sde): la//bsam gtan rnam thar rten byed pa//de dag shes rang mtshan nyid yin//grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni//song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing //mi zad zhum
214b5(mdo sde): pA yod min pa'i//mkhas po thabs la mkhas pa yin//'jig rten gsum po thams cad las//skrag cing 'dra 'dzi bsten med la//bdag nyid du la zhing zhi gyur pa//de
214b6(mdo sde): ni shes rab pha rol phyin//'gro ba dag na 'das chen dang //tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa//kun+da na snang ba de dag no//thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin//brtan pa chags
214b7(mdo sde): med spyod byed cing //yi ge don gnyir mi byed la//brjod med ngos don don gnyer ba//de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//mangs pa tshogs pa thams cad na//snang zhing chos
215a1(mdo sde): rnams ston byed la//dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa//de ni thabs kyi rol phyin//mngon shes shes la mkhas gyur cing //ni shing dul
215a2(mdo sde): la zag pa med//bdag med gzhag pa yod min pa//de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing //zhing rnams bye bar 'gro byed la//swAng+yas
215a3(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba mang mchod pa//de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin//phung po sgyu ma 'draro shes shing //nyon mongs dngos med shes byed nas//de dge bdud kun ni b+hur bA//de ni shes

215a6(mdo sde): spyod yul dang //blang med dor ba yod min pa//da ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin//rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing //stong nyid rab tu sbyin gyur pa//kun gyi pha rol son
215a7(mdo sde): byor pa//mnyam med 'gog pa mtshan nyid yin//zag med rdul ba ma yin pa//de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zing //'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni//sems
215b1(mdo sde): na kyi gags sa sgyur//mad nam sa chags kyin mams so//ma thas pas pas lam bsdu pa yin//shes pa dbas pa mkhas pa 'o//yan lag ldan /

215b3(mdo sde): med pa'i thabs kyis ni//ma khas par btun mi 'gyur//shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa//de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cid //gnyis gzung du 'jug 'gyur na//ngas ni

216b5(mdo sde): drudrang lhan cig gnas sam/'jam dpal dris smras pa/lha'i bu bral te 'phags pa'i lom gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni 'phags pa'i lAm nyon mongs dra rnams dang lhan

220a6(mdo sde): can rnams pham par byas so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ltar 'di la mu stegs can thams cad kyi spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam
220a7(mdo sde): dpal chos kyi tog btsugs so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu snang ba med pa deng mun pa med pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bus smos pa/'jam dpal 'dis ni
220b1(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lho rab tu bskor ro//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal chos bstan
220b2(mdo sde): pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig byas/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag la snang ba'ang med pa mun pa'ong med pa de dag chos kyi snang bar byas so//lha'i bus smras
220b3(mdo sde): pa/'jam dpal sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par
220b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/'dzum dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug por mi 'gyur ba rnams so//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'ching bas rnam par
220b5(mdo sde): 'jug par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i
220b6(mdo sde): sgo nas thar pa tshol bar mi byed pa dang /gang dag 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba mnyam par gyur pa dag
220b7(mdo sde): ste/de dag gis ni 'ching ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'khrug pa'ang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di ba shad pa na srog tshogs lnga
221a1(mdo sde): bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang ci ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /de bzhin
221a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di drug brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so//lha drung mi rnams kyi skye
221a3(mdo sde): dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med hr-ing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni le na
221a4(mdo sde): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro ba lo//'dod pa ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri'ang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//srog
221a5(mdo sde): chags dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma nyi khri'ing len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang
221a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te//thams cad drung ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga'
221a7(mdo sde): ba dang /mgu ba dang /yi rangs pa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'de ched du brjod do//e ma'o kun nas
221b1(mdo sde): yongs grol ba'i//dmigs med chos ni legs par bshad//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis//shin du legs par bshad par byas//de nas byang chub sems
221b2(mdo sde): dang 'de dag dang /g+hA dang /k+Shu dang /gnod sbyin dang /drizla dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi ma ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi
221b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang mi'i mched pa dag byas te/stong bri bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi chur dge bab/rin po che'i char drag kyang po'o//gos kyi char dag kyang pang
221b4(mdo sde): bdug spos kyi cher dag dang /spos chu'i char dag dang /phyi ma'i char dag kyang bab bo//lha rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu bsil
221b5(mdo sde): to//dge bsnyen dang /dpe bsnyen ma rnams dang /rdul po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'dzum dpal gzhon nur
221b6(mdo sde): byur pa la mchod pa byas so//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces/bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
221b7(mdo sde): dad par mi bgyid po de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'thung ba ma mchis legs so//gang dag chos kyi rnam brengs 'di spong bar 'gyid pa de dag la ci rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags
222a1(mdo sde): so//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrub ste gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs par ma mchis lags so//de dag la ni 'phags
222a2(mdo sde): pa'o bsnyen par rdzogs pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'dra ma mchis lcags so//gang dgra chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis
222a3(mdo sde): lags so//de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma ma tris lags so//gang dgra chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa'ang ma mchos/mngon par
222a4(mdo sde): rtog pa'ang ma mchis lags so//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'byed pa drung /thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang /len par bgyid pa dang /kun chub
222a5(mdo sde): par bgyid pa dang /'dzin par bgyid pa dang /klog par bgyid pa dang /yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang /snod 'tshal bar bgyid nas gzhan dag la'ang ston par 'gyod pa
222a6(mdo sde): dang /skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang /rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang /'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag kyang nan tan
222a7(mdo sde): gyis sgrub du stsol pa dang /nyams par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang /sems can chen po dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po
222b1(mdo sde): labasnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /gting rnyed pa dang /log pa lhung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang /ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yengs
222b2(mdo sde): su zin pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la shin tu gus pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshor ba lags shing /de dag no
222b3(mdo sde): 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/skyes bu dam
222b4(mdo sde): pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang mchis lags so//de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mchis lags so//de dag lnga ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang /khom pa dang
222b5(mdo sde): ldan pa lags so zhes kyang gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
222b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ba shed pa na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams lo tshas kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
222b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnam por dag go//lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrog brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//lha dang /
223a1(mdo sde): dang /gno sbyin dang /hrIH dang /m+bu yin dang /nam mnga' rjid dang /mi'am ci dang /lho bye chen po dang /dge slong dang /dge slong
223a2(mdo sde): sa dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge basbyin mu su yi dge gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'di na gnas pa dang /'jog rten gyi khams glen na dgan pa 'dus
223a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa nyis stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogaso
223a4(mdo sde): so sor thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dang 'o 'bur gyis ni gzungs dri ma med pa so sor thob par gyur to//de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dgu byang chub
223a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang /ston pa dang /'dzin pa dang /

223a7(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi du 'am/rigs kyo bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /yo gar 'dri ba dang /da
223b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du glegs bem du bgyis te 'chang ba dang /tha na lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang /rna lam du grags par dbyed pa de dag
223b2(mdo sde): bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams
223b3(mdo sde): pa khyod de bzhin gshogs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dre bar sems pa ni legs so legs so//byamos pa de'i phyir legaso bar rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang nges
223b4(mdo sde): khyod la bshad par bya'o//byams pa nan gyis dper na lha drang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lhu'am mi gong zhig gris sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

223b6(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i rda yi ger dros te 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed pa drang /gzhan dag la ston par byed pa ches bsod nams mang du bskyed
223b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring por mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro//byams pa nga ni gang dag gis
224a1(mdo sde): khang sde'ang thos nas spang bar mi byed cing mos par byed pa dang /than glegs pam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mo ldog pa
224a2(mdo sde): nyid du lung ston to//byams pa ni gang dag gis mdo ste ba mo do lta bu 'di na ming tsam+bu dzes pa de dag cing 'bras bu lded par lung ston par byed na gang dag mos pa dang /
224a3(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /grazhan dga' 'ang ston par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/dang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /lung nod pa dang /kha ton
224a4(mdo sde): byed pa dang /klog pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dra bar byed pa dang /phebs par smra bar
224a5(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom

224a7(mdo sde): lung ston par yang 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos po de ni
224b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyis kun dpa' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig gzhan dga'a'ang rgya cher ston cig/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom
224b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
224b3(mdo sde): dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab rtul sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang /'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar
224b4(mdo sde): yang gzung zhig/de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das podag
224b5(mdo sde): cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du thos lags na ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste rgya cher bstan pa de lta bu'i chos ni nas yang ma byung
224b6(mdo sde): lags so//bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong legs te/de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las

226a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba sdig pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/
226a2(mdo sde): na/bcom ldan 'das bA ro NA si na drang srong smra ba dgas kyi nags na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs

226b6(mdo sde): ngama?/mi 'bum gyis sngon 'brang de btsal bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'bad de btsal na ci'i slad du/
226b7(mdo sde): de mi thob/ma rtogs kyis de'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de phye ba dang /ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang /ji ltar
227a1(mdo sde): bsgrub par byabri babam ldan 'das kyis bdag la du ltar legs phyur bstan du gsopa/de skad ces gso pa dang /bcad ldan 'das dzA

227a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshong dpon gyi bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni nyon gcig bzhin du snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas
227a6(mdo sde): yid la byas te/sems can thams cad kyi sa bas na nas dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang rim gra bya ba mi gtang bar bya'o//tshang dpon gyi bu
227a7(mdo sde): gzhan yong las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khang nas yid la byas te/sems can thams cad kyis bsam nos dus gsum du danan
227b1(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i yI dam mi gtang bar bya'o//chang dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying zag pa rus pa'i khod nas yang
227b2(mdo sde): la byas te/sems can thams cad kyis bsam nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum gyis mi stong par dus gsum du gsol ba gadrab pa mi gta
227b3(mdo sde): bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum bskal pa du mar gnas par dus gsum du gsol ba gdab par mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi
227b4(mdo sde): kha mos thams cad du sems can thams cad la bskal pa du mar tshes bstan par dus gsum du gsal ba gdab par mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
227b5(mdo sde): du sems can thams cad la ci nus pa dang /ci lcogs pa dang /ji ltar gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin du theg pa gsum la byang chub tu sems bskyed par dus gsum du
227b6(mdo sde): gsol ba grang ba po mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can thams tsod bsgral ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
227b7(mdo sde): myur zhing rings par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab par mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis khongs su gtogasate/
228a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyis byang chub gsum thob par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams
228a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ngon 'gror skyes pa thams cad ngan 'gro thams cad nas gdon par rus gsum du gsol ba gdab par mi gtang bar
228a3(mdo sde): bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs po'i sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa
228a4(mdo sde): mi gtang bar bya'o//'jig pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa spong bar 'gyur ba
228a5(mdo sde): dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa mi gtang bar bya'o//'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs
228a6(mdo sde): rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa byebs cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dus gsum du rjes su yi rang ba mi gtang bar
228a7(mdo sde): bya'o//tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid las byas te/sems can thams cad kyis bsam
228b1(mdo sde): nas dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa dang /bdag nyid sdig pa spyod pa la rnam par smod pa dang /sdig pa spyod pa la bshung ba dang /sdig pa las nges par 'byung
228b2(mdo sde): pab dang /dge pa thams cad 'dod pa dang /dge ba thams cad blang ba dang /tshe rabs tshe rabs su'ang dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bsgyur bye bar gsol bya gdab
228b3(mdo sde): dang /gcig tu nges par rnam par dag pa'i dbye ba'i spyad pa spyod par gsol ba gdab pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya
228b4(mdo sde): byar gsol ba gdab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par gsol ba gdab pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor por gsol ba gdab pa dang /bskal pa du mor
228b5(mdo sde): chos bstan par gsol ba gdab pa mi gtong bar bya'o//tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni pha ma'i gnod pa med bya dang /bu dang /chung
228b6(mdo sde): mA dang /dran dro dang /bran mo dang /las spyod pa dang /zho shas 'i chu ba dang /mdza' bo dang /blon dro dang /nye du dang /rgan rabs la gnod pa med par ji ltar
228b7(mdo sde): mos pa dang /ci nus par nges dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang ngo pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la gnas shing
229a1(mdo sde): drug pa dang /glan por 'jug pa dang /mi lhod par jug par bslab par bya'o//gal te bsgrub pa'i gzhi lnga la slob mi nus na'ang /des bzhildam/
229a2(mdo sde): gsum mam/gnyis sam de'i nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi cig tsam la'ang ba slab par bya'o//gal te bslab pa'i gzhi cig tsam la spyod kyang mi nus na de sdig pa'i
229a3(mdo sde): las mi dge ba gang dang gang kun tu spyod pa de la zhen pa ma yin pa dang /drag po ma yin po'i sems dang /mi dga' bzhin pa dang /ldad ba dang /yang ba'i sems
229a4(mdo sde): dang /don gyi dbang dang dregs pa'i dbang gis spyad par bya ste/de mi dge ba bcu'i las khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang /'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang /dga'
229a5(mdo sde): ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pas kun tu spyod par mi bya'o//kun tu spyad par 'dod pa na'ang rnam par smad par bya/rnam par bshung bar bya'o//spyod cing
229a6(mdo sde): 'dug pa na'ang rnam par snad par bya/rnam par ba shu bar bya'o//spyad zin pa ni'ang rnam par spad par bya/rnam par po shung bar bya'o//so sor po shags par
229a7(mdo sde): bya'o//nges par btung bar bya'o//legs pa dge ba ci'ang rung bzhig/kun tu spyod pa na ni des ni de lo sems zhen pa dang /drog pa'i sems dang /tshim pa dang /
229b1(mdo sde): mgu ba dang /lhod pa ma yin pa dang /yang ba ma yin pa dang /bar chad med pa dang /drad pa dang /dga' ba dang /dang pa dang /mchog tu dgang ba'i dbang du
229b2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems kyis kun tu spyad par bya'o//kun tu spyod par 'dod pa na'ang snying thagA pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/sems can thams cad kyis bsam nas sems
229b3(mdo sde): can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang /dgrol ba'i phyir dang /dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
229b4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bor bya'o//des
229b5(mdo sde): dge bo kun tu spyod pa 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba thamaso cad lo'ang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid lo byas te/sems can thamaso cad kyis
229b6(mdo sde): sam nas/mngon par bsdus te brnam nas rjes su yi rang por bya'o//rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dang /phul dang /gtsong dong /rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya
229b7(mdo sde): nom pa dang /dam pa dang /mnyam pa med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa dang /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang /mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang
230a1(mdo sde): pas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//rjes su yi rang nas kyang dge ba kun tu spyad pa de'ang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems da' dang /rang sangs rgyasnga dang /nyan
230a2(mdo sde): thos/thams cad la dbul bar bya'o//phul nas kyang sems can thams cadad thun mong du bya zhing sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dang /dkrol ba'i phyir dang /
230a3(mdo sde): dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
230a4(mdo sde): thob par bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//des kau shi ka'i gos dang /tsan+dan
230a5(mdo sde): dang /oM ga ru'o bdug pa la sogs pa dang /yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong ngam/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' mgur spyod dam/lam du 'gro ba 'am 'du
230a6(mdo sde): byed dam/bya ba thams cad byed na 'dra bla na mi dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdun pa dang /dad pa dang /don du gnyer ba dang /smon pa de 'da' zhog rtag tu rgyun/
230a7(mdo sde): mi ched par rjes su dran par bya'o//yid la bya'o//bsdom par bya'o//lan mang du bya'o//de ltar byas na de sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems lhod pa

230b3(mdo sde): srab par 'gyur/gsog du 'gyur/med par 'gyur ba dang /legs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa rnams la sems zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i 'gro ba gang dang phrad pa dag tu
230b4(mdo sde): chung bar mi 'gyur ro//'khu pa dang /gsod pa dang /'ching ba dang /rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa rnams legs par spangs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
230b5(mdo sde): mu med pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can mtha' yas mu med pa rnams kyi thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa dus mtha' yas par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba

231a1(mdo sde): rug ga sdug bsngal gcad par bya ba dang /dgag par bya ba dang /rnam par bri bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /byams pa'i sems su gyur pa dang /snying
231a2(mdo sde): chen po'i sems su gyur pa dang /go cha chen po bgos pa dang /theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos

231a5(mdo sde): sgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /sra bA dang /brtan pa dang /rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro//tshong dpon gyi bu de lta na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de go rims 'di
231a6(mdo sde): lta bus mthar gyis srid pa 'di dang /srid pa phyi ma dang /skyid pa lan grangs gzhan dag la sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'grib par byed pa dang /chung ngur byed pa nas gsog tu
231a7(mdo sde): byed pa'i bar dang /legs pa dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba nas dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'ang sogs
231b1(mdo sde): shing sgom par byed de/legs pa dge ba kun tu spyad pa rnams yongs su sbyin pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang
231b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe yul da ra da na swa daM ra dri'i rgyal po sin du gi ri zhes bya ba'i bu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ba ra Na
231b3(mdo sde): sir song nas de bcom ldan 'das dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to//de nas da ra dwa'i rgyal po sin du gi ri'i bu stan los langs te/bla gos phrag po gcig tu gza re nas
231b4(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
231b5(mdo sde): 'dras khyod kyis legs par bka' stsal to//bde dar gshegs pa khyod kyis lags pa ro bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyi gsol bar 'debs

232a1(mdo sde): mchis par bgyid/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'ang sogs shing sgom pa dang /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing sra ba dang /brtan pa dang rdo rje lta
232a2(mdo sde): bur 'gyur na gong du rtsol zhing brtson pa mi gtong ba lta ci smos lags/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la bgyid de/sems can

232a6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/yang dang yang du lan brgyar brtun te/mtha' yas pa mtha' yos par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

234b2(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir//khyim pa bye ba drug cu btsun par gyur//badz+ra byin lce chog stong dang ldan pa dang //tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug dbang sgyur lha//bdud kyi bu po dred dpon

234b5(mdo sde): khri ro'i tshad ni dpag tshad de rlangs par yod//rgyal mtshan dag kyang dpag tsha phyed bar mtho//rgyal mtshan rnams kyi g.yas drang g.yon du ni//de'i drung dpag tshad pas mtho
234b6(mdo sde): snyigs bu dag/rang bzhin gcig te nor du rin po che//bye ba las byas dpag tshad mtho bar 'bogs//khri yi bur bar lha'i ba dan yang //dpag chad pas kyang ring ba sha
234b7(mdo sde): stag sbyangs//ba dan rdza rje gser gyi dra ba dag/dril bu gau yer/ngag gis mdzes par byas//khri rnams kyi ni reg tu ka ba yang //bye ba drag sdong bye ba legs par sna
235a1(mdo sde): gang gisra 'di ru khwa mchog de dag ni//btan par byas pa sgo gtan bcug pa bzhin//khri yI steng du gasrer las byas pa dang //gser lta bu dang
235a2(mdo sde): dngul dang bai DUr+ya//de bzhin shaMlA dang smyug dang rdo rnying dang //de bzhin rna ba dang ni khrigro pa nas//byung ba min pa'i mu tig gdugos dag byas//tsan+dan shin tu dmar
235a3(mdo sde): pos dmar bar bskus//re re dag ni bye ba steng du tshangs//drin pas dang ni khril chu lta bu'i//mkha' rten drug kyang byas nas de la ni//gser phyeng ba dang ni gser lta bu//
235a4(mdo sde): dngul dang de DUr+ya deng dri bzhin shel//sdug dang de bzhin rnga'i snying po yi//ma nga rten su so byas nas de la ni//ri no chanA dril sgra shin tu snyan pa btags//rnam 'dren sgra ni
235a5(mdo sde): rnam par grags pa yI//mchod pa'i don tu bdugs pa rab tu bzhag/yangs pa tsan gyi steng gi ber snang la//gser gyi skud pa las byas bla ri bres//gser gyi skud par
235a6(mdo sde): mchog tu bzang //rin chen chun 'phyang steng phrad bye ba sbyangs//mu tig rgyan 'phreng stong phrag bye ba yang //re re gser las byas pa'i skrod pas brkus//yangs pa'i grong
235a7(mdo sde): khyer gnas pa'i la tsa bo//gang dag gung du 'dong ba der nyams dga'//de tshes ni skyes bu bdun srid g.yogs//grong khor yangs pa kun tu res yug bkram//dri ba
235b1(mdo sde): spyan na / sa na su sa/( /gas sus sur+m+ma/ sa smras nas su
235b2(mdo sde): g.yon gyi phyogs su'ang bye ba bdun cu stong //shAkya seng ge mchod pa'i dri na du btsan//de 'dra'i bkod chen byas nas li tsa'i//gzhon nu dra ba can gyis de yi che//dga' bye
235b3(mdo sde): sems kyis pha ma la smras pa//sangs rgyas spyan drangs slad du bdag mchi'o//grong khyer mchog nas mkhas pa de byung ste//rgyal bdag chen po gal bar song nas//yon
235b4(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho zhabs la mgo bo yis//phyag 'a tsha la der ni gzhan nu phyogs gcig 'du'o//de nas li tsa bi gzhon nu rin chen dra bo can yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nus byung nas/
235b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sde phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas li tsa bo gzhon
235b6(mdo sde): nu rin chen dab can de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos drung ldan pa'i gtan gyis yang dag par dga' bor mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzeng bstod//
235b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu dgang dar mjed do//de nas li tsa'i gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus maM g.yas pa'i lha nga sa pa btsugs
236a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sprul ba de legs sa rgyal mo sbyar ba rgyud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das sang dge sbyong
236a2(mdo sde): gri dge dran+d+ra dang babs cig tu bdag gi sbrum par gdug tshod gsol bar cig nang /bcom ldan 'das kyis li tse baM gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la thugs brtse ba nye bar bye rgyu
236a3(mdo sde): ste/cang mi gsung bar gyur bas gnang ngo //de ni sa li tsi bi gAnon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar myur pas gnang bar rig nas bcom
236a4(mdo sde): ldan 'dasal lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zud nas song ngo //de nas li tsa'i gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed

236a6(mdo sde): robargya dang ldan pa rnam pa sbyor du bcug go//skyer nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang gdan po shams shing yangs pa logs par brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
236a7(mdo sde): ba der song hU~M/byin pa dang /decom ldan 'das kyi rnabs la mgo bos byag batshal te phyog/sa gcig tu 'jug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas le tsa'i gzhon nu
236b1(mdo sde): rin chen dra ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod la bab ste/de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen na gdugs chod lags
236b2(mdo sde): te/dus lnga bab lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus slad g.yogs dang chos gis gsol/lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong gi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa
236b3(mdo sde): dang thabs cig tu steng gri bar snang la mi bdun gyi srid tsamo mngon par 'phags te yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so//bskyod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs
236b4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam po drug du 'gul/rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/g.yos rab
236b5(mdo sde): tu g.yos/kun du rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/bur bur rab tu 'ur bu re/kun tu rab tu 'ur bur/che mchi ma/rab tu che mtsham/kun tu
236b6(mdo sde): rab tu chem chem ste ltas bco brgyad dang ldan pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//gzhan yang cho 'phrul bye bas ya brgya phrag stong snyed ston cing yangs pa can du gshegs
236b7(mdo sde): so//de'i tshe lnga bye nga sa ya brgya phrag stong du ma lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po rnams dang /lha'i rin po che las byas pa'i me tog
237a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang /rin po che'i phyim dang /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser dang /lha'i rin po che'i phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
237a2(mdo sde): mngon par gtom/mngon par rab tu gtor to//lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrog khrig phrag 'bumi mngon par rab tu dkrol to//lha'i rgyan dpag tu med pa rnams kyis brgyan
237a3(mdo sde): to//steng gi bar snang la tsan+dan dmar po shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun phab par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la li tse bi lazhon nu rin chen dra ba can kyog nas
237a4(mdo sde): ga la ba der gshegs te/byon A gdan ba shams pa de la bzhugs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dag dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma'i

237a6(mdo sde): ba bzang po rab tu mang pos tshim par byed cing gang bzhed pa spobs par byed do//de nas li tsa bi gzhon nudu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol
237a7(mdo sde): lags par rig nas lhung bzed blangs te chab phul nas phyag bcabs so//bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ri ngo'i chos gos gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol
237b1(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams la'ang chos gos gsum gyis mngon par g.yogs te/

237b3(mdo sde): te zhu bo lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de nas bcom
237b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis li tsi bi gzhon nu rin che ni dra ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang dong gang so ma nyi yod pa zhus sheg dang /
237b5(mdo sde): ngas de dang de'i zhu ba lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o//de nas li tsa bi gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
237b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi sngon lam dang ldan pa bzhugs shing 'tsho ba gang dag gi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis
237b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnaso pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo som nyi ma mchis shing the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur/phyir mi ldog cing bla
238a1(mdo sde): nam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang 'gyur/tshe rabs dran pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur/nam du'ang ser sna'i semasra dang lhan cig
238a2(mdo sde): mi ga nas/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi yongs su bskor bar 'gyur/nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bral bar 'gyur/yon tan grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
238a3(mdo sde): byis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par dgyes par bgyis pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par bgyid/bdud thams
238a4(mdo sde): cad shin tu skrag par bgyid/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad stong /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i sems kyi bsam pas dri ma sel/sems can thams
238a5(mdo sde): cad chos dkar po la yang dag par bskulo/lhas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpas kyang bsam par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byin

238a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/sgra dbyings kyi rnam pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par thob par 'gyur/tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur/
238b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mthun pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa lta bzhugs lags sam/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lI tsA'i gzhon nu

238b3(mdo sde): shing khyod bzang ngo //de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par nyin la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te//

238b5(mdo sde): no 'di nas shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig ca ni zhes bya ba zhig yod de/gzhon nu 'di lta ste/srid pa'i rtse mo gad+hA'i klung gri bye ma snyed du gyur la/
238b6(mdo sde): dgra thams cad kyong rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur tso//de nas skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bas de dag la rdul phra mo'i rdul cigo khyer te/ji tsam du
238b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthas gdugs pa de dag rdul phra mo'i rdul gyis yongs su gang ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
239a1(mdo sde): 'das nas rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig 'jog na/gzhon nu rnam grangs de dang blangs de'i gzhis yun ring po 'das pas rdul phra mo'i rdul gyi phung po chen
239a2(mdo sde): po'i mnga' dag zad pa'am/gzugs par 'gyur ram/gzhon nu de ci snya du sems/'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes bu des rdul phyi rang kyi rdul de dag bzhag
239a3(mdo sde): pa'am ma bzhags pa de dag bsdus pa'am/bgrang ba'am gzhal ba'am/nye bar brtan par sgo'am/gsol pa bcomo ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom
239a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i slad du gang zhig dbye 'di bshod pa la yang dag pa'i 'dra shos bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni shes pa'i phung po mchog dang ldan par
239a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lags so//gzhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams grang du skyes bu des rdul phra mo'i rdul de dag bzhag gama?/'on te ma bzhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi kha bIs de
239a6(mdo sde): drag thams cad kyi 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung nas srid pa'i rtse mo la thug gi bar gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur lA/skyes bu gnyis pa
239a7(mdo sde): zhig thung bas de dag las rdul phra mo'i rdul cig khyer te/ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi rdul phra mo'i rdul de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye bo khrag khrig phrag
239b1(mdo sde): 'bum 'das nas rdul phra mo'i rdul gcig 'jog na/gzhon nu rnam grangs des na yun ring po 'das pas rdul phra mo'i rdul bsngags pa'i phung po chen pong 'dong bar 'gyur ro//
239b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu rnam grangs dris na skyes bu phyi ma des grangs med pa brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur ba 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bumi snyed
239b3(mdo sde): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tog can to//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i
239b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs
239b5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhog de bzhino gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs
239b6(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan la sdom nyi mi za zhing ngas mthong ba la'ang yid ches na/de'i tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i rgya bo srid
239b7(mdo sde): la'ang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshe bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed par 'gyur/tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur/mngon par shos
240a1(mdo sde): pa lnga'ang rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu gzungs brgya 'khyil pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur/gang+gA'i klung gi bye
240a2(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba nyid du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed par 'gyur/de'i sems shin tu rmo nges po
240a3(mdo sde): med cing bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu 'gyur/sred med kyi bu'i lus lngar mkhregs po'i lus su 'gyur/lus dbyibs gcig la s+thi dza bzhi par 'gyur/
240a4(mdo sde): de'i lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus brgyan cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyings su'ang 'gyur/mi khom
240a5(mdo sde): dathams cad kyang spong zhing dral pa phun sum tshogs pa'ing 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
240a6(mdo sde): pas bka' stsal pa/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan//thos nas som nyi mi za zhing //nges mthong ba la'ang yid ches pa//de ni yon go nas 'os pa yin//
240a7(mdo sde): rtag tu 'khor los skur ba yi//rgyal srid 'thob cing sangs rgyas mthong //mthong nas dpag tu med pa dang //bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byed//rtag tu tshangs
