451a6(mdo sde): yin mod kyi/'on kyang btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang nyam chung bya de ni stobs dang ldan pa'o//de ci'i byar zhe na/gang nyon mongs pa nyam
451a7(mdo sde): chung ba de ni ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o//gong sir sna nyam chung ba de ni sbyin po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang tshul ngan pa nyam chung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi
451b1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang gnod sems nyam chung ba de ni bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang lde lo nyam chung bya de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang gi yang
451b2(mdo sde): de nyam chung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang 'tshal po'i shes rab nyamu chung ba de ni shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o//de bzhin du chos thams cad
451b3(mdo sde): de gang dang gang las byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba nyam chung ba de dang nga las de dge ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la legs so/
451b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gnang ste/bu mi legs so//legs so//ji ste bstan pa lta na de ltar bstan par bya'o//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya bzod bu skyes
451b5(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ongs gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag dge bo'i rtsa ba gang gis/
451b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bu mo bya
451b7(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spong ba na theg pa dman pa 'dod cing bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do//
452a1(mdo sde): de yi dam la brtan pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song nas gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs thob ste/
452a2(mdo sde): gnas la'ang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'ang gnas ma yin par yong dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/stobs
452a3(mdo sde): da thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am/lha 'am/bdud
452a4(mdo sde): dam/tshangs pa'am/gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par mi bskor pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
452a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/rang gi las las gyur pa/las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa yin te/de las kyi rnam par smin pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas
452a6(mdo sde): byang chub thob pa na 'ang sngo pa dang /ma'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las dang /lus yang dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gnas deng nus
452a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/stobs de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pango khor gyi nang du seng ge'i
452b1(mdo sde): sgyu yang dag par sgrog ste/khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing /dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gang gis kyang 'jig rten
452b2(mdo sde): dri chos dang mthun par mi bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskur to//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/sems can rnams
452b3(mdo sde): kyi dbang po la brtags nas chos ston te/de dag shes nas dbang po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang ldan te/de dbang po'i rim pa mkhyen pa'i
452b4(mdo sde): stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
452b5(mdo sde): shes te/bu mi de bzhin gshegs pas gang sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
452b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams kyi
452b7(mdo sde): khams la 'jug ste/zhugs nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang /khams rdo lnga pa bzhin du gnas so//de khams la 'jog pa'o stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang
453a1(mdo sde): chub thob pa na khams dum pa dang /khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
453a2(mdo sde): bzhi pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi mos pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i
453a3(mdo sde): ye shes kun tu tshol te/de ltar mos pa la mi smod do//de mos pa'i stobs 'od dang ldan pas byang chub thob par sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag
453a4(mdo sde): gi mos 'du ma dang /mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra'ang shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems
453a5(mdo sde): dbang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /nyan thos kyi zag pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po thams
453a6(mdo sde): cad du ye shes gtong ngo //de shin tu bgro ba mkhyen pas stobs 'di dang ljon pas/byang chub thob pa na kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
453a7(mdo sde): pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs drug pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems do pa'i byang chub sa mas dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin
453b1(mdo sde): len pa yin te/sems nges par rtog cing nyon mongs pa dang bral te dul zhing cang shes so//de cang shes kyi stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na sems can gzhan
453b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jig pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
453b3(mdo sde): par byung ba dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byed
453b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spod pa na/sngon gyi rgya las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gson te/bag yod pa yin/sngon dam bcas pa las mi nyams po yin
453b5(mdo sde): ni//de sngon gyi rgyo las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gson pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa ni/bdug dang sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag
453b6(mdo sde): gasngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa ma byin pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang
453b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na sems can gang yang spang ging bar mi byed lam bslabs pa la dbang mi za zhing sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur
454a1(mdo sde): pa yin no//de snang ba'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na lha'i mig gi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de ba nin
454a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/sems can gang gi zag pa 'phel ba'i phyir yang
454a3(mdo sde): gnas ma yin gyis zag pazed par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/zag pa 'phel por bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi zag pa med pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams
454a4(mdo sde): la lam nye bar ston to//de mos pa zag pa med pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na zag po thams cad zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
454a5(mdo sde): tu shes par 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o//bu mo de dgo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/byang chub sems dpas de dag rdzogs par
454a6(mdo sde): byas nas stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//bu mo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu dge ba 'di
454a7(mdo sde): dog thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa 'di dge yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o//de tsam ldan
454b1(mdo sde): 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang /
454b2(mdo sde): ji ltar ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
454b3(mdo sde): bu mo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa na gzhan gyis shes par mi bya'o//snyam nas slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab par mi byed de/sems
454b4(mdo sde): can thams cod la sems snyoms pa yin bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing chos mnyam po nyid du mthong ba yin/tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/de
454b5(mdo sde): byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nas so zhes dam bcas pa la chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs
454b6(mdo sde): mo rgas zhes 'dir nga la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/delha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am su'ang rung ste/'jig rten ni chos dang mthun pas rgol bar 'gyur
454b7(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mtshan ma de yang dge bar rjes su ma mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de bde ba brnyes pa dang /'jigs pa med
455a1(mdo sde): pa brnyes pa dang /mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa yin te/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing /khyu mchog go gnas su ngam 'chang /
455a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tsha nges pa'am/gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor po'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskur
455a3(mdo sde): ba 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang po'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spang pa spyod pa na/bar du gcod
455a4(mdo sde): pa la bar du gcod pa'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de bar du gcod pa'i chos lo ma ston to//mi 'jug go/mi skyed do//gzhan dag
455a5(mdo sde): la'ang mi 'chad do//mi ston to//bar du gcod pa'i chos su shes nas spong ngo //de byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/gang ngas bar du gcod pa'i chos
455a6(mdo sde): su gsungs pa de dag la sten pa la ni bar du gcod pa ma yin no//zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/'dir nga la gang yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/
455a7(mdo sde): 'ad ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad por dkar po'i chos la
455b1(mdo sde): mis pa yin te/rnam par byang ba'i lam du zhugs shing sems can thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i chos ston te/yon tan gyi chos nyid mngon sum du gyur pa yin no//
455b2(mdo sde): yan lag go chags gang dag gis rnam par byung bar rnam par dag pa'i lam gnon par 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi tshogs de dag la ba dag kyang spyod/sems can gnan
455b3(mdo sde): lnga'ang ston to//de byang chub thob pa ni seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/gang ngas rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la ston pa la ni rnam par dag pa
455b4(mdo sde): yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas med de/'di dang la su 'ang rung rdol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang
455b5(mdo sde): byang chub semos dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/bdag gis shes shing mthong gri gzhan gyis mi shes mi mthong ngo zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal du nam
455b6(mdo sde): dro'ang mi ldang ste/rtag tu rgyun mi chad byang mngon pa'i nga rgyal med cing sdig pa 'byed pa blo sbyangs pa yin no//de chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na
455b7(mdo sde): sing ga sgra sgrog ste/nga zag pazad do zhes dam bcas pa la zag pa 'di lta bu zhig yongs su ma zad do/zhes bya bar ngo lta bu'i gnas med de/'di nga la su 'a
456a1(mdo sde): rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
456a2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa ni/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lam ster ba'i sems can rnams la lam mtshan par byed de/lam gyi gom yi nas mdzad mo'i mi mnyam pa mnyam par
456a3(mdo sde): byebyu ngo //zam pa dang rdo stegs kyang 'dzugs so//mtshan maM mun pa mun nag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten lA mar me'ang 'bul lo//sems can
456a4(mdo sde): lhung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i 'byung pa sel to//kun nas ldang ba med par byed do//gzhan gyi 'byung ba mi bskyed do//gzhan gyi ltung ba byung
456a5(mdo sde): be gleng bar mi byed do//chos la dogs pa skyes pa'i sems can rnams la dgas pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir chos ston to//the tshom dang /yid gnyis dang /nam
456a6(mdo sde): nur med par byed de//chos kyi snang ba sgrub bo//shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par skyed do//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /chas smra
456a7(mdo sde): thams cad lo ches bstan par gsol ba bdebs te/chos yang dag par 'dzin cing sku me pas legs so zhes bya ba brjod do//sems can gang la'ang mi 'phya'o//
456b1(mdo sde): 'thod slad mi byed do//chos la shed ma 'bya ba dang /sdang ba dang /mog myos pa dang /rmongs par mi byed do//skye bo'i nges pa'i tshig la dbang za bar mi byed do//
456b2(mdo sde): tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mos so//yi ge gsog dang yi ge stong pa nyid kyis tshig tu brjod pa thams cad la skyon du lta ba ma yin no//'khrul pa'i skabs
456b3(mdo sde): mi tshol lo//de chos yong dag par blangs pa 'ani dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ste/dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa ston pa dge la de la de
456b4(mdo sde): med cing kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin de shin tu bsgoms pas phyir sgra skad thams cad du 'jug pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas rtag tu rkyen ma chad par de bzhin gshegs
456b5(mdo sde): pa 'khrul ba meng ba'i tshig gis chos ston te/thams cad du phyed par lung ston pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o//bu ma
456b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa ni/tshig gi sbyin thams cad spangs pa yin te/bden pa smra/chos smre/don sla/'jal ba smra
456b7(mdo sde): zhing /mu tsher ma sme/byung rgyal rdo mi skye ste/'phags pa ma yin pa'i gtam thams cad spangs nas 'phags pa'i mi smra ba thob cing dge slong gi chos kyi bya ba rtsod pa mang
457a1(mdo sde): bal zhugs te/chos dang nyan cid yongs su rgol bdung /gzhan la'ang ston pa de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan dag zhi ba dang /nye bar ni
457a2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su tshol lo//rtsod pa med pa lhur ldan pa'i phyir de smra dang yang mi 'thab mo chod do//dgrar mchil lo//dgra med pa'i chos la ma
457a3(mdo sde): pa yin no//brjod du byed pa'i chos rnams la 'dzag go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ldan gyis grub pa la mngon par dad do//sems can gzhan yang chas
457a4(mdo sde): nyid 'di yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/de chas yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na ca co med pa zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//de
457a5(mdo sde): yi ge 'bru gtsug kyang mi brjed cing mi smra sgra skad thams cad dang /nges pa'i tshig gis bston pa dag la'ang ldan gyis grub pa nyid du legs par bre shad pas 'a
457a6(mdo sde): tshim par byed do//rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshal po'i ting nge 'dzin shin du bsgoms pa dang /spyi mtha' yas bsgrub pa'i gzungs la me bes pas de bzhin gshegs pa
457a7(mdo sde): gnas thams cad dang /mtshan thams cad dang /dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /spyi'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra dbyangs bsam gyis
457b1(mdo sde): mi khyab pa 'byung ste/thA na sgra gcig gis kyang 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi
457b2(mdo sde): rla bos dang /ye shes kyi stobs kyis de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms de lhun gyis grub pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
457b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
457b4(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong po rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran po'i rjes su dran pa drug pa
457b5(mdo sde): dang mi 'dril ba yin no//sems can gzhan yang rjes su dran pa 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/de chos yang dgra par blangs pa 'di ngaji ldan pas byang
457b6(mdo sde): chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la bskal ba med pa zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//chos thams cad la dbang skur ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin du bsgom pa dang //
457b7(mdo sde): chos kyi smon pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas rtag tu rkun ma ched por ji bzhin gshegs pa bsnyil ba med pa'i chos can yin no//gal te sems can thams cad kyis bskal
458a1(mdo sde): bar bsams te/snga byi med par the tshom dri ba d+ma dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su drin kyang de 'di bshad do//'di bstun ta hA mu
458a2(mdo sde): mi sems mi rtog la rtag tu rmongs shing don pa'i dbang pos skad cig yud tsam cig la legs par bshad pos sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa 'di ni bu
458a3(mdo sde): mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod po na/rtag tu
458a4(mdo sde): rgyun mi chad par pha rol gyi sems srung ba yin te/gzhan gyi sems 'khrugs par mi byed/sems gdung bar mi byed/sems la dmigs por mi byed/dge bo'i
458a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i bar du gcod par mi byed/chos la dmigs par mi byed cing chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu mos te/g.yo ba med rlom sems med cing sems can thams cad
458a6(mdo sde): la sems snyom pa yin/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ste/chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med cing ro gcig pa la zhugs pa yin no//de chos yang dag par
458a7(mdo sde): blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub rlob pa na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yong mnyam par ma bkag pa med pa yin te/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam
458b1(mdo sde): bA nyid rnam par spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /kun nas 'khyil ba'i sgo'i gzungs la mkhas pa'i mnyam par bzhag cing lhun gyis brung pa'i tshul
458b2(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o//du mo gzhan yang byang chub
458b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na/phyin ci log gi 'du shes med pa yin te/sems byon ci log med/lta ba phyin ci log med/med pa la sgro 'dogs
458b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyin ci log med pa yin/bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/srog tu 'du shes pa ma yin/gso bar 'du shes pa ma yin/gang
458b5(mdo sde): zag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/shed lngas skyes par 'du shes pa ma yin/zhing bur 'du shes pa ma yin/chad par 'du shes pa ma yin/rtag par 'du shes pa ma
458b6(mdo sde): yin/debyung bar 'du shes pa ma yin/'jig par 'du shes pa ma yin/dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na mtho med
458b7(mdo sde): pa dang zag de dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par bya ba
459a1(mdo sde): ba dang /'khor ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma yin la/'du shes la chags shing zhen pa'i sems can rnams
459a2(mdo sde): la 'du shes byin ci log spong bar ston kyang che ba dang tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin/mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs te dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa
459a3(mdo sde): yin/chos mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin no//de chos yang dag par blangs pa bdi dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med
459a4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa drong /mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin
459a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i gnas la gnas kyang mtshan ma thams cad la 'du shes kyis 'dzin pa dang /rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying
459a6(mdo sde): rje chen po mi ldog ste/sems can 'dul ba'i dus la'ang rung cing chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
459a7(mdo sde): pa lnga pa'o////bam po gsum po//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag tu rgyun mi chad par btang snyoms
459b1(mdo sde): pa yin te 'khor ba na spyod pa nyon mongs shing sdug bsngal ba'i chos thams cad la de btang snyoms pas bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi chos la rjes su
459b2(mdo sde): chags pa'ang med/sdug bsngal bya dang /yid mi badre ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la khong khro ba'ang med de/de rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang
459b3(mdo sde): bral bas don thams cad rnyed cing 'byor kyang khengs par mi 'gyur don thams cad yongs su nyams kyang dud par mi 'gyur gyi 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang /
459b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog cing bdag med pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes mos te btang snyoms pa yin no//sems can gzhan yang btang snyoms
459b5(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid de lta bu yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa ni de bzhin gshags pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa zhes bya ste/de la
459b6(mdo sde): btang snyoms de med pa yin no//gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin
459b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nan ma khar lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /ngargya byin
460a1(mdo sde): dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /mingang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsti stang du byas te/mchod cing ri maur byas/
460a2(mdo sde): kyang rjes su chags pa med /bdud dang /gzhan ma stegs can dang /phas kyis rgol ba dang /'tshe ba can gyi sems can tho mos cad kyis dkrugs shing
460a3(mdo sde): gnod par byas kyang khong khro ba med la/sems mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin te/phan 'dogs pa dang /gnod par byas pa la sa dang mo tshungs pa'i sems dang
460a4(mdo sde): chu dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang /me dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang /rlung dang mtshungs po'i sems kyis khengs par mi 'gyur/dud par mi 'gyur zhing mi 'brugs
460a5(mdo sde): tI/nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing snyoms can thams cad la btang snyoms par gnas pa yin no//de cho sa nges par sems
460a6(mdo sde): pa'i btang snyoms 'di dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la stong rje chen po mi ldog ste/sems can 'dzul ba'i dus la'ang rub cing /ci rigs par ston pa'i
460a7(mdo sde): rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'ang ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chose ma 'dres pa drag po'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
460b1(mdo sde): sos pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/rtag tu rgyun mi chud par mos pa drug pa yin te/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol pa la mos pa rlabs po che dang /mos pa
460b2(mdo sde): chen po dang /mos pa zab myos dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan par mos so//nyan thosna dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spong bar mos so//theg pa chen po
460b3(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par mos so//sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po btang ba yid la byed pa mi 'dor bar mos so//rang gi rtog cing grub kyi/gzhan gyi dring
460b4(mdo sde): la mi 'jog par sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par mos te/bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dmigs pa can lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang /
460b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis de mos pa dang dbral bar mi nus so//de chos yang dag par blangs pa'ang dang ldan pa'i byang chub thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa
460b6(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/de lang med pa yin no//mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs
460b7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi nang nas gang bstan par bya ba de ston to//gang du skad cig zang cig yud tsam gyis dus gang dang /nyi tshong
461a1(mdo sde): /gang dang /yulnga gzhan gang dang /sems can gyi sems kyi rgyung gang dang gang la snod kyi lta ba bzhin du ci rigs par chos ston kyang mnyam
461a2(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bdun pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byar
461a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nA/rtag tu rgyun mi chud par brtson 'grus brtsamaso pa yin te/de rtag tu brtson pa mi 'dor/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgru ba
461a4(mdo sde): cing sbyor bas ngoms mi myong /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsom pa la rtul cing bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /chos smra ba dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
461a5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyi gan du 'gro la/yongs su 'dri ba dang /bsnyen bkur ba dang /mchod pa'i las dang /bskal pa tshad med par 'khor po yongs su gzung
461a6(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang /sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /sangs rgyas tshad med pa la
461a7(mdo sde): mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshe de mang po yang dag par gzung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos che de med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
461b1(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir te/brtson 'grus nga tshad med
461b2(mdo sde): par byos pa yin no//de chos yong dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/de la
461b3(mdo sde): de med pa yin no//brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas sems can tshad med pa dazud cing gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzu
461b4(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa tshad med pa ston kyang rdzu 'phrul de chags pa med/sgrib pa med/thogs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
461b5(mdo sde): cad du 'gro ste/mngon par phyogs kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med cing thams cad du rgyu ba nAm mkhas klas pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
461b6(mdo sde): chos mi 'dres pa brgyad pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byung chu bo sems dpa' byang chub semasI dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag tu rkyen mi chad par dran pa phun sum tshogaso shing /
461b7(mdo sde): dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pa yin to/de'i dran pa de brjod pa med pa yin/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rjen las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la dran
462a1(mdo sde): panya bar bzhag pa bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa ma yin no//de nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/mi rtag pa dang
462a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyar ro//phyi'i lus dang /phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhi
462a3(mdo sde): ga nas te/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'i rnam por yid la byed cing sbyor ro//nang gi tshong po rnams la tshor/
462a4(mdo sde): ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//de bzhin du phyi'i tshor ba dang /phyi nang gri tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing
462a5(mdo sde): gnas te/stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//nang gi sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gaunas te/mtshan ma ming pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//phyi'i
462a6(mdo sde): sems dang /phyi nang gi sems kyi rjes su lta zhid gnas te/mtshan mA med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//rlung gi chos rnamaso la chos kyi rjes su lto
462a7(mdo sde): zhing gnas te/smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//phyi'i chos dang /phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/smon pa med
462b1(mdo sde): 'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro//lus la nugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhug pa sgom ste/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdub
462b2(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par yid lo byed cing sbyor ro//yang de bzhin ga shigs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do//tshor
462b3(mdo sde): bAb la zhugs pa'i dran po nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal
462b4(mdo sde): gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun kyang mo gcod do//sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/mtshan
462b5(mdo sde): ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do//chos la zhugs
462b6(mdo sde): pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sbom ste/smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/sangs
462b7(mdo sde): rgya kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug go//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang
463a1(mdo sde): chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pas teng ngo
463a2(mdo sde): 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyis mtha' dang /phyi mo'o mtha' dang /de ltar byung
463a3(mdo sde): ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /dbang po dang /khams dang /mos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags
463a4(mdo sde): dang /bsam pa dang /brag la nyal ba dang /kun nas dkris pa dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smon par gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /tshe
463a5(mdo sde): dang 'chi 'pho dang /skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /bskal pa dang /zhing du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /nyan thos 'dus pa dang //
463a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgud pa dang /pha ma dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams gcig nas gcig tu brgyad
463a7(mdo sde): po bstan pa la dran pa'i dbang po thogs pa med cing rmongs pa med pa yin te/thams cad du phyed par lung ston pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
463b1(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par shes rab spyod pa yin te//
463b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi 'od dang /shes rab kyi snang ba dang /shes rab kyi pyodadro pa dang /shes rab kyi dbang po dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /zab pa'i shes rab dang /nges/
463b3(mdo sde): par rtog pa'i shes rab dang /mi thub pa'i shes rab dang /zil gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag
463b4(mdo sde): dka' ba'i shes rab dang /yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab dang /shes rab lhag pa'i shes rab dang /bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi lung
463b5(mdo sde): mnos pa med pa'i shes rab dang /thos po tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba'i shes rab can te/thos nas kyang shes rab kyis khong du chud cing rtogs te/mgo'i thod
463b6(mdo sde): la me 'bar ba bzhin du bsti stang byed cing thos pa tshol lnga thos pa snying por byed pa yin/thos pa bsag pa yin/chos 'dod cing chos la dga' bas dga' lde mos
463b7(mdo sde): pa yin/dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te/de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs su mi gtong ba med do//de bla ma la rim gro bya/
464a1(mdo sde): ba mi byed pa gang yang med do//de sdug bsngal gyi phung po mi bzod pa gang yang med do//de chos 'dod pa des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcud
464a2(mdo sde): pa gcig nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la ni ma yin no//chos kyi tshog
464a3(mdo sde): gcig la shin tu dga' ba yin te/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pa la ni ma yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mnyam pa la shin tu dga' ba yin no//brgya
464a4(mdo sde): byin dang /tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no//tshig bzhi po'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la ston par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/grad+hA'i klung
464a5(mdo sde): go bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no//gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/
464a6(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur bar rgyal srid gAd+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no//gzhan drag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi gtan rab tu ston
464a7(mdo sde): bal dga' bo yin to/den byin dang /tshangs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no//de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas bsti steng
464b1(mdo sde): du byed cing chos nyan to//bsti stang du byed cing gzhan la ston to//de ltar mngon par brtson pas tshegs chung ngur de lta thams cad kyis yongs su bzung po yin/sangs
464b2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no//de lhas yongs su bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug log thams cad
464b3(mdo sde): bodag nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no//de shes rab kyi snang ba'i sgo zad mi shes pas snang ba ma yin no//de chos kyi snang ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa
464b4(mdo sde): rna de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang /dge ba dang /
464b5(mdo sde): mi dge ba dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'jig rten pa
464b6(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /'gog pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang /chos kyi sgo thams cad khong
464b7(mdo sde): du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa dang /zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa shes pa dag la de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang /
465a1(mdo sde): phyi ma'i ma dung /dam+WAr blang ba'i dus la chags pa me ni sbyin pa med de rnams kyad du thogs pa myed do//phyi ma'i mthur de ba
465a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la bstan kyang thug pa med do//dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgom pas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
465a3(mdo sde): chos kyis sgo gcig las chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing /chod kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par sgrub pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin ga shegs pa
465a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o//bu mi gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par khyim gyi gnas don
465a5(mdo sde): du mi gnyer ba yin 'dod pa don du mi gtor ba yin te/de khI ma nas 'byung ba dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mang ba yin/dben pa la gzhol/dben pa la 'byab
465a6(mdo sde): dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brjon te/stong pa nyid drang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
465a7(mdo sde): gsum po 'di sgom mo//gang las kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing mi rtogs pa dang /dmigs par lci ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams
465b1(mdo sde): cad kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsdoms pas sgrub pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa'i kun tu skye'o//chags pa med pa'i
465b2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob bo bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'di'o//ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sgrub pa dang rgod pa dang kun
465b3(mdo sde): nas dkris pa dang /lta ba dang nyon mongs po dang mtshan ma thams cad lA ma spyong ngo do//de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par zer pa rab tu thob cing rnam par thar pa'i sgrogs
465b4(mdo sde): la rnam par rtsen pas chos zab mo ston pa yin no//don la rten pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rnon pa maM yin no//ye shes la rton pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin
465b5(mdo sde): no//nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi dran pa'i don la rton pa ma yin no//chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no//sems can thams cad kyi rten
465b6(mdo sde): du gyur pa yin te/yi ge dang rnam par rtog pa'i chags zhen pa la don la ston pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags zhan pa
465b7(mdo sde): le ye shes la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la tshigs non pa la rton pa nyid bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//
466a1(mdo sde): rnam par rtogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags zhen pa la mtshan ma med pa la bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//khams gsum la chags
466a2(mdo sde): zhen pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//'dod chags kyi chags zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i rnam pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//
466a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang spyod pa la chags zhon pa la byams pa bstan nas yongs su thar byer byed do//gti mug spyod pa 'i chags zhen pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung po bstan nas
466a4(mdo sde): yongs su thar bar byed do//so ro sna la chags zhen pa la sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//dran pa'i ngang tshul la chags zhen pa
466a5(mdo sde): la rdul khrims kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//gnod sems la chags zhen pa la bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar ba
466a6(mdo sde): byed do//le lo la chags zhen pa 'i brtson 'dus kyi pha rol tu phyin+da pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byung ngo //g.yeng bral tshogs zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha
466a7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//'aral po'i shes rab la chags zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed
466b1(mdo sde): de/so so'i skye ba'i sa la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//phyin ci log la chags zhen pa la mi rtag pa dang /sdug
466b2(mdo sde): bsngal ba drang bdug med pa dang /zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//sgrib pa dang tshid pa dang kun nas dkris pa dang /lta bu thams cud la chags
466b3(mdo sde): zhen pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do//nyon mongs pa thams cad lnga chags zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas
466b4(mdo sde): yongs su thar bar byed do//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol bar snyoms par med pa zhes bya
466b5(mdo sde): ste/de la de med pa yin no//de'i rnam par grol ba de mi 'khrugs shing shin tu mthar thug ste/dba' rlabs mdu la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos por gyur cing thob
466b6(mdo sde): ste/nyan thos dang rAng spangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpagra bka' ba yin sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba ste/dri mu med cing dri ma dang
466b7(mdo sde): brelo te rnyog pa med pa'i shin tu yongs su dag pa yin/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byed pas zad mi shes pa yin/bstan
467a1(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin ste/dri ma med pa'i snying
467a2(mdo sde): bopo ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pas gzungs la mo khas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol
467a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun pa yin te/thams cad las byung zhing chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/mya ngan las 'dres pa la gzhol
467a4(mdo sde): ba yin/mya ngan las 'jas pa la 'bab pa yin/mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin te/shin tu mthar thug cing shin tu mthor phyin pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin
467a5(mdo sde): gshegs po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ye shes lhur len
467a6(mdo sde): pa yin te/ye shes kyi stobs dang /ye shes la 'bab pa dang /ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin te/de'i ye shes do ni nyamos pa med pa 'gro ba'i mngon
467a7(mdo sde): par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las nges par byung ba'o//nyams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/thams cad
467b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems lnga'ang 'dod chags dang brngas pa'i sdoms su yang dag pa ji lta ba
467b2(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag bya ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin /
467b3(mdo sde): du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /zhe sdang med pa dang /gti mug dang bcas pa dang /gti mug med pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /nyon mongs
467b4(mdo sde): bri med pa dang /'khor byed dang bcas pa dang /'khor byed med pa dang /zang zing med pa dang /mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /bla
467b5(mdo sde): me dang bcas pa dang /blo ma med pa dang /sgrib pa dang bcos pa dang /sgrib pa med pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /dge ba dang /mi
467b6(mdo sde): dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las
467b7(mdo sde): 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /rnam par dag pa dang /rnam par ma dag pa dang /chung ngu dang cher
468a1(mdo sde): zur pa dang /mngang drud bcas pa dang /mtha' yas pa dang /ser sna dang ldan pa dang /gtong ba dang ldan pa dang /ngang tshul ngan pa'i
468a2(mdo sde): sems dang /tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang /gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang /gnod sems med pa dang /le lo dang /brtson 'grus dang ldan
468a3(mdo sde): ba dang /g.yeng ba dang ldan pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'tshal ba'i shes rab dang /shes rab dang ldan pa dang /so so'i skye bo'i sems dang /log//
468a4(mdo sde): pa nyid du nges pa dang /yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg par nges pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nges pa dang /theg pa chen por nges pa'ang
468a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o//yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'di ni sdug bsngal kun
468a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de mi skyo ba shes pa'i
468a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes so//shin tu kun tu mi rgyu ba'i shes pa'i kun 'thung ba rab tu shes so//chang ba med cing rtag pa meng po shin tu skad
468b1(mdo sde): cig pa/'gog pa shes pas 'gog par rab tu shes so//thams cad kyi rjes su song ba nam mkha' yang dag par 'du ba bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med//
468b2(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pas yam rab tu shes so//de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag da ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes kyang sems
468b3(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du'ang mi byed la bden pa yongs su shes pa dang /spangs pa dang /bsgoms pa dang /mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems
468b4(mdo sde): can rnams la ches ston te/de'i chos bstan pa de bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal ba med pa yin/mthar lta ba thams
468b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su spangs pa yin/dbu ma'i lam lnga zhugs pa yin/brten pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/de thams cad rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen dang bcas
468b6(mdo sde): ba'i kha na las kyi/bradag gi kha na las pa ma yin/sems can gyi kha na las pa ma yin/srog gi kha nA las pa ma yin/gso ba'i kha na las pa mo yani/skyes
468b7(mdo sde): bu'i kha na las pa ma yin/gang zag gi kha na yas pa ma yin par rab tu shes so//de ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes so//'du byed kyi rkyen
469a1(mdo sde): gyi rnam par shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang /ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang /skye mchod
469a2(mdo sde): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang /reg pa'i rkyen gyis ra ba dang /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis skyed pa dang /sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang /len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang /srid
469a3(mdo sde): po'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang /skye ba'i rkyen gyis rba shi dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dzin pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde pa dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung //
469a4(mdo sde): ste/de ltar ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po ma 'dris pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur bar rab tu shes so//de ma rig pa 'grag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dang /de ltar
469a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi phung po ma 'dres pa bde 'gag par 'gyur bar rab tu shes so//de 'di la yang dag par slob pa na gang ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba de ni bdag gi rkyen las
469a6(mdo sde): byung ba ma yin/sems can gyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/srog dang gso ba dang /gang zagra gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin no//gang bdug gi rkyen las byung ba ma/
469a7(mdo sde): yin pa nas/gang zag gi rkyen pos byang ba ma yin pa'i bar de na stong pa'o//stong pa gang yin po de ni chad pa ma yin/rtag pa ma yin no//chod pa ma yin/rtag
469b1(mdo sde): po ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gdod ma nyid nas mu skyes ma byung ba'o//gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba gang yin pa de ni dus gsum du brjod du med do//ngas gsum
469b2(mdo sde): brjod du med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrang ba med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'o//bgong
469b3(mdo sde): ba med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'o//don dam pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag/
469b4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni 'thab pa med cang rtsod pa med pa'o//'thab pa med cing rtsod pa madra ba gang yin pa de dge sbyong gi chos so//dge sbyong gi chos gang yin pa de nam mkha'
469b5(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du des de ltar shes shing gnas te/tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun 'byung bas mo rig pa kun 'byung bar rab tu shes so//ma rig pa 'gag pa
469b6(mdo sde): nas/rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas chad par lta bar sbyor ba ma yin gyi/bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /srog
469b7(mdo sde): med pa dang /gang zag med pa'i rjes su song ba yin te/mtha' khas mi len/nye bar mi 'dzin mi dmigs so//mtha' mi dmigs pas dbus yang dag par rjes su mi
470a1(mdo sde): bong ngo //chos gang la mAH'a mo dmigs pa de la dbus yod par gal 'gyur te/de'i mthu' ci 'dra ba zhig snyam nas/de mtha' dang dbus
470a2(mdo sde): med pa'i chos rnams la 'jug go//chos kyi dbyings so mtha' dang dbus dang bral bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos ston pa yin no//de chos yang dag par
470a3(mdo sde): blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ste/de la de med pa yin no//stobs
470a4(mdo sde): bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /mtha' yas 'khyil bu'i gzungs la mkhas pas de'i rnam par grol ba yi shes mthong ba dri chos dbyings mtha'
470a5(mdo sde): dang dbus med par yang dag par 'du ba yin/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya che zhing rnam par mi rtog la lhun gyis
470a6(mdo sde): grub pa yin/blangs pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /du ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa bstan pa rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar ston pa yin/sems
470a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la mngon sum du gyur pa yin/khams du ma dang khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig
470b1(mdo sde): rten bstan pa rnams la shin du rnam par gdon mi za bar ston pa yin/smos pa du ma pa dang /mos pa sna tshogs shes pa bstan pa rnams la mi zad par ston cing
470b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa yin/kun tu 'gro ba'i lAm shesra pa bstan pa rnams la phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing phung por lung ston pa yin/bsam gtan
470b3(mdo sde): dang /rnam par thar pA dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba shes pa bstan pa rnams
470b4(mdo sde): la chos kyi sgo bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnam par bzhag pa ston pa yin/sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho
470b5(mdo sde): dang /cha dang /skye ba po 'bring tha ma dang /thog ma'i mthar chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ston pa yin/thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i lha'i
470b6(mdo sde): mig shes pa bston pa rnams la kun tu rnam par lta ba thams cad du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i lung bstan pa ston pa yin/zag pa thams cad zad pa shis
470b7(mdo sde): pra bstan pa rnams la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar ba ma lus par spang bar shes pa ston pa yin/mi 'jigs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la zil gyis
471a1(mdo sde): ston pa yin/snying rje chen po'i stobs shes pa bstan pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad du bya ba med rdzing spyod pa mtshungs
471a2(mdo sde): pa mnyam pa rgyun mi gcod pa ston pa yin/so so ci rigs par chos bstan pa rnams la lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul po ston pa yin/sems can
471a3(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba'i phyir mi zad pa'i chos kyis 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa rnams la zab mo dang /sna tshogs
471a4(mdo sde): dang /snrel zhing rgyu ba dang /shes rab dang /thabs dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shrIs ston pa yin/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /thun
471a5(mdo sde): mang ma yin pa yin te/buso 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis so//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub semaso dpa' byang chub sems
471a6(mdo sde): nga ba'i sdud pa spyod na ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/de ye shes kyi lus kyis las byed pa ni 'di lta ste/'khu ba dang /
471a7(mdo sde): g.yo bo dang /gya gyu dang /chu yo 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do//sdang ba med cing chagos pa med pa yin/rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing de lus kyi las kyi brtson
471b1(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pas byang chub dang mthun te/bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin/pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing rtag tu sems
471b2(mdo sde): can gyi don la brtson te/lus kyis las de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pos byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gr-i shigs pa'i
471b3(mdo sde): lus kyi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhingang ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/de la de yod do//gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin
471b4(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms pa dang /kun nas srung ba'i gzungs la me bas paste de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog du ma dang /kha dog sna tshogs dang /gzugs dang /
471b5(mdo sde): dbyibs dang /chu zhing ston pa'i lus kyis lha dang /kru dadu gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha'i lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang
471b6(mdo sde): lto phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /
471b7(mdo sde): dge slong dang /dge slong mo dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen mo dang /srog chags brgya stong du ma lhags pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad du spyod lamachod
472a1(mdo sde): med pa dang /khadog dang /rtags dang /dbyibs gnas pa mchog dam pa gca bgya rnam pa'i lus bstan nas thams cad dang ldan pas
472a2(mdo sde): 'khor la chos kyi gtam kun tu ston to//yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/gzungs stod do//rab tu dga' bar byed do//kun tu bstan/yang dag par
472a3(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/gzengs bstod/rab tu dga' bar byas nas mi snang bar byed do//mi snang bar gyur kyang song bar shes par yang med de//'khor 'dus pa
472a4(mdo sde): de dag tu 'dres shing 'dug ste/skyeb ma cad mi snabyung rlung 'ongs par shes pa'od med do//de la lta bas kyang ngoms mi myong ngo //des bsten pA la dga' ba dang /
472a5(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba rab tu rgya chen po 'di rnyed do//'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba dang /yul dang longs spyod thams cad lo mi lta ba yid la byed cing sbyar ro//
472a6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur na bu lta bdong mthun pa'i phyir sgom pa de 'gyur ro//de la lta bas sgom pa dang /lta di pa dang /rgyus nyan pa'i sgom pa dang /chos nyin 'dza
472a7(mdo sde): bi de'ang zag pa med pa'i lus kyi las dang /ngag ga las dang /yid kyi las 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgya
472b1(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems drapa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ye shes kyi byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/
472b2(mdo sde): rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/de ye shes kyi dgag les byed pa ni 'khu bo dang /g.yo dang /gle g+hu dang /tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed de/bden
472b3(mdo sde): bIr slu zhing phra ma dang /ngog rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa mi slu bo yin/phan dri'i tshig dang /ran pa'i tshi ge dang /chos kyi tshig dang /de tshig de dag smra ste/
472b4(mdo sde): tshig des bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro//tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang bu don dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ste/tshig des sems can thams cad
472b5(mdo sde): tshim par byed do//de mig she mi 'tshig ste/ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yin gyi/nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa mu yin no//de chos yang dag par
472b6(mdo sde): blangs pa'ong dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/dri la
472b7(mdo sde): nga yod de//rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi
473a1(mdo sde): las ci'ang mi 'dzod byung /de srung thams dngal sgra brnyan dang /'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa nim par byed ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
473a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang dbyangs ni don dang ldan pa/chos dang ldan pa/bden pa dang mthun pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
473a3(mdo sde): mi 'gul ba/yid 'byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral po dang mthun pa/nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/'bras bu yod pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyur
473a4(mdo sde): pa yin te/bu mo 'ang ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi po'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dang rje
473a5(mdo sde): spyad pa spyad pa ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par ye shes kyis byas po'i las rnams byed kyi/nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni
473a6(mdo sde): 'khu ba dang /g.yo ba dang /kye b+hu dang /tshul po chos pa thams cad mi byed do//brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba dang bra'o zhing
473a7(mdo sde): yang dag par lta ba yin/byams pa dang /snying rje la gnas te/sems can thams cad sems snyoms shing byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa yin no//de
473b1(mdo sde): yA shesdu dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa
473b2(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thems cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/de la de yod do//de ltar byung ba'i sangs
473b3(mdo sde): rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /brnag pa rnyog pa med pa'i gzungs lo mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems gcig
473b4(mdo sde): gro sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so//sems can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rang
473b5(mdo sde): ge sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no//sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi
473b6(mdo sde): sems mnyam pa nyid du khod du chud ba yin no//lus thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir rang gi lus kyi chos nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid
473b7(mdo sde): khong du chud pa yin no//sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid kyi rang gi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no//rang gi lus sems can thams cad
474a1(mdo sde): lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'dul ba yin no//sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par
474a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba yin no//sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur byin gyis rlob bo//de'i byin gyis rlabs de ni lha dang bcus pa'i 'jig rten dang /bdud du
474a3(mdo sde): bcas pa dang /tshangs par bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang byam zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang
474a4(mdo sde): gis kyang g.yos pa dang /bskyod par mi nus te/bu mo 'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub
474a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te/zla chum
474a6(mdo sde): mi zla nem nur med cing mi dang nga la kun tu mi do dang zhing mi skrag la kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa yin no//de
474a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang /lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dog pa/chags pa med cing
474b1(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so//'dras pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gri las 'jig rten gyi
474b2(mdo sde): khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /dbyangs
474b3(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so//'das pa'i de bzhin gshogs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang /zhing
474b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang /sangs rgyas thams cad dang //chos thams cad dang /sems can thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'athams cad dang /nyan thos dang /
474b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam por 'byed pa la mos so//'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs
474b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod po chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa lnga'id mos shig yid ches te/the tshom mi za nem nur mi byed cing mi drangang la kun tu mi dngang
474b7(mdo sde): mi skrag la kun du skrag par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la'ang mos so//sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'do
475a1(mdo sde): lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs
475a2(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/de lnga de yod do//dpo' bIr 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang //
475a3(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /tshe'i tshad tha dad pa raHsa
475a4(mdo sde): bzhin du brda sprad pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
475a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams dang /sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /sems can gyi spyod pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams dang /de bzhin du 'das
475a6(mdo sde): byabaskal pa thams cad de/bskal pa ging dag sangs rgyas dang btsos pa dag dang /bskal pa gang dkaSh+Na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
475a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rim bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
475b1(mdo sde): meng za dang po dang /gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dung gang dag chung ba dag dang /gang dag rjor g+hu
475b2(mdo sde): pabadag dang /gang dag phra ba dag dang /gang dag rags pa dag dang /gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dge dang /gang dge spre'u tshogs
475b3(mdo sde): bdag dang /gang dag mthun pa dag dang /gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par bzhag pa dang /mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug par rjes su zhugs
475b4(mdo sde): pa'adres pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rim bzhin du borda spyod pa'i mtha' nas mi rtogs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bsten pa thams cing
475b5(mdo sde): la rmong sna pa myed de lag mthil dang /snor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/bu mo 'di ni dri bzhin gshegs pa
475b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o//bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ma 'ongs pa'i nga bzhin gra shegs
475b7(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te/the tshom mi za ne ma nor med cing mi dngang mi srog skrag par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam
476a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa la'ang mos pa yin no//ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri dag gi lus
476a2(mdo sde): dang /lus kyis las dang /lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rje rjes su snang
476a3(mdo sde): ba la mos so//mu 'ongs pa'i de bzhin go shegs pa de dag go dag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgro brjod pa chags pa med cing sgris
476a4(mdo sde): pa med la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /dbyangs dang /chos kyi sgo ched med pa bstan pa/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la
476a5(mdo sde): mos so//ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyis las su dus thams cad dang /zhing thams cad dang /sangs rgyas thams cad dang /chos
476a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang /sems can thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi
476a7(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par bye ba rnam par 'byed pa la mos so//ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing
476b1(mdo sde): sgrib pa myed pa la'ang mos shing yid ches te/the tshom mi zla nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos
476b2(mdo sde): pa yin no//sems can gzhan drug kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/de chos yang dog par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub
476b3(mdo sde): thob par ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/de la de yod do//snying rje chen po'i
476b4(mdo sde): stobs dang /smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin du bsgoms pa dang /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs
476b5(mdo sde): paM ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /tshe'i tshad tha dad pa rabs bzhin du brda sbed pa'i mtha' ni mI rtogs so//de bzhin du ma 'ongs
476b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /sems can rnams nga/sems can gyis spong pa rnams dang /sems
476b7(mdo sde): can gyi las rnams dang /sems can gyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong po rnams dang /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/bskal pa gang dag sangs
477a1(mdo sde): rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang /gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang /bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
477a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i basprul pa de dag go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten
477a3(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang /gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /gang dag rnam pa dag pa dang /gang dag chung ba dag dang /
477a4(mdo sde): gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang /gang dag phra ba dag dang /gang dag rags pa dag dang /gang dag rdul phra rabs la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang /
477a5(mdo sde): gang dag spri'u tshugs pa dag dang /gang dag mthun pa dag dang /gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mchi mes rnam par bzhag pa dang /mig 'phrul rnam par dbye
477a6(mdo sde): ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//rdo la de bzhin
477a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes
477b1(mdo sde): to/bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o//ba mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyad
477b2(mdo sde): pa na nga lnga byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te the cham mi zo nem nur med cing mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/

477b4(mdo sde): lus kyi las dang /lus kyi spyod lami yongs su dgra pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so//ra
477b5(mdo sde): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams rgyud du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa tshugs pa med cing sgrib pa med la bsam gyis
477b6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /dbang sa dang /chos kyi sgo tshang mod pa bston pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so//da ltar byung
477b7(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang /nga thams cad dang /chos thams cad sems can thams cad dang /byang chub
478a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu
478a2(mdo sde): rnam par bye ba/rnam par 'byung ba la mos so//da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa
478a3(mdo sde): lIlde'ang mos shing yid ches te/the tshom mi za nem nur med cing mi dang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la'ang mos pa
478a4(mdo sde): yin no//sems can gzhan drug kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jig go//de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'a deng ldan pas byung
478a5(mdo sde): chub thob pa na/da ltar byung ba'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/de la de yod do//shin
478a6(mdo sde): t+yad//rab dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i
478a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /tshe'i ched tha dad pe rabs bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du de ltar byung ba
478b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /sems can rnams dang /snams can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /las
478b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams gor rim bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad
478b3(mdo sde): de/bskal pa gang dag gi sangs rgyas dang bcos pa dag dang /gang dgra sangs rgyas med pa dag dang /bskul pa gang la ji bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
478b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rim bzhin du brda sprad pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so//de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten
478b5(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dod pa dang /gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang /gang dag chung ba dag dang /
478b6(mdo sde): gang dag rjer gyur ba dag dang /gang dag phra ba dag dang /gang dpe rags pa dag dang /gang dag rdul phra rab la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang
478b7(mdo sde): gang dge spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang /gang dge mthun pa dag dang /gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mchims rnam par bzhag pa dang /migo 'phrul rnam par dbye
479a1(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go ram bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mthang ni mi rtogs so//de
479a2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bsnyen pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/lug mazil dang ser mo lnga mdzad ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi
479a3(mdo sde): thams cad shes te/bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o//bco brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas
479a4(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob sde thams cad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/lus tshad med pa dang /thams cad zil gyis gnon cing thams cad du khyad par du 'phags
479a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /lus kyi sman dang 'dra ba'i phyir mthong ma theg tu sems can rnams
479a6(mdo sde): kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang /thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /mi 'jogasu pa rab tu thob pas bag tsha ba med
479a7(mdo sde): pa dang /yong dag par sbyor ba'i slob ma bsam pa can dang /gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa dang /mthun pa'i slob ma mi phyed pa dang /sems can thams
479b1(mdo sde): cad la mtshungs par gnas pas slob ma shin tu dul ba dang /chos bstan pa la the tshom med pa'i spobs pa myur ba dang /gleng ba med pas sems can thams cad tshim par
479b2(mdo sde): byed pa dang /don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa la sangs rgyas kyi sgra skar 'byin pa
479b3(mdo sde): dang /cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon du lta ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams tshad med pa brtan pa'i phyir de lta
479b4(mdo sde): bal mi ngoms pa dang /yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /spyod lam mi 'khrugs pas glang po'i lta stengs kyis lta ba dang /spro ba che
479b5(mdo sde): bas seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang / lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang /ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas ngag
479b6(mdo sde): la dbarda ba dang /yid kyi los ye shes sngon du 'gro bas kun nas mig dang ldan pa dang /spobs pa myang bas bzung bar thos pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /bla na
479b7(mdo sde): med pa'i sran gnas su gyur pa'i rnyed pa'i mchog dang /grags pa'i mchag dang ldan pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas btugs pas bsod nams
480a1(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa dang /mthub che chen po'i lus dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi ba med pa dang /sems can thams
480a2(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can la bde ba bskyed pa las mi ldog cing 'khrugs pa med la brel phongs pa med pa dang /'jig rten
480a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas chos dang gtsug lag mang po shes pa dang /chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang /shin tu mur thug cang maHsa klas
480a4(mdo sde): pas mthong ba dang /reg pa dang /bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /den pa dang /thos pa don yod pa dang /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pas shes
480a5(mdo sde): rab mi 'khrugs pa dang /mos sla zhing nyes par spro ba mang bas rgyan chags pa dang /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus pa spangs pas bag chags thams cad
480a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bcom pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos byung ba'i slob dngon meng ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas rnam pa thams cad shes pa
480a7(mdo sde): ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos mang dris pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob po////bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'de
480b1(mdo sde): skad rjes gsol te//bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs
480b2(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bu rtsa gonyis mngon par grub de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad
480b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//bu mo sdod dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis

481a1(mdo sde): dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa ni sngon bgro ba sna tshogs byin pas grub bo//bdun mtho ba ni sngon bza' ba dang btung ba rgya chen po byin pas grub bo//

482a1(mdo sde): rtse mo g.yas su 'khyil ba ni sngon mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /dge ba'i byashes gnyen gyi gdams dag mthun par 'dzin pas/
